story:
Triple Cream Yogurt

With 100% Organic Dairy from Grassfed Cows

Peak Yogurt makes the first Triple Cream yogurts using just organic dairy and live active culture. With triple the milkfat of regular whole milk yogurts, it's the bold and delicious alternative to sugar-filled nonfat yogurts.

This campaign will fund the launch of our first product: A Greek-style yogurt with 18% milkfat made here in the San Francisco Bay Area.


"Peak Yogurt's Greek is the best yogurt I've ever tasted." -Sam Mogannam, Owner of Bi-Rite markets

Updates

Portland, OR is now a pickup location!

Shelf life: Our yogurt lasts a LONG time--at least 40 days in the fridge

In the Press

Forbes: Is This The Beginning Of The End For Nonfat Yogurt?

Bay Area Bites: Local Entrepreneur Hopes to Bring “Triple Cream” Yogurt to Market

Team Yogurt: Maker Profile | Evan Sims of Peak Yogurt

My San Francisco Kitchen: "When I tried my first bite, my mind was blown...I ate it for breakfast...and felt energized all morning." Introducing Peak Yogurt

VOX: "I found an engineer, Evan Sims, who had quit his job for a high-fat yogurt startup…His cream-infused Greek yogurt has more than twice the calories of regular "full fat" yogurt--and I consumed a tub of it weekly"  in "I lost weight by eating lots of bacon and cream. Here's a scientific explanation for why."

Yogurt Pre-Orders

How It Works

If you live in our Northern California delivery area or near one of our five pickup locations, you can be one of the first to experience our yogurt by pre-ordering through this campaign.

Follow these steps to select the right yogurt pre-order perk:

1. Select your perk size - Small, Medium, or Large

The shelf life of our product is at least 40 days (about 6 weeks). Each 24-oz container holds three 460 calorie large servings or six 230 calorie small servings. We based our estimates in the table above on one person consuming 3 large yogurt servings (or 6 small) per week. But if you love yogurt like we do, you might consume twice that amount!

2. Select Pickup or Delivery

We'll deliver anywhere in the nine Bay Area counties, plus Sacramento, Santa Cruz, and Yolo Counties. Or you can pick up your yogurt at one of five locations in California, Colorado, Oregon, and Washington state. We'll have at least three pick up dates for each location (exact dates and location address to be determined).

3. Select your perk!

Select the right perk for you and complete Indiegogo checkout process.

Not in the pickup or delivery areas?

Why not gift your pre-order to a friend who is? Or make a donation of your yogurt! Just select one of our Pickup perks and let us know that you'd like your pre-order to support a charitable donation. We're always here at hello@peakyogurt.com.

Other Great Perks

T-Shirt, $25 - Choose version #1 or #2. Ships anywhere in the U.S.

Yogurt Making Class, $99 - Make Your Own Triple Cream Yogurt!

2 hour class delivered as a live webinar, recording available afterward.

Learn the secrets to making amazing homemade yogurt from Evan Sims, the founder of Peak Yogurt.

What we'll cover:

  • Overview of history, biochemistry, and microbiology of yogurt.
  • How to make yogurt! Everything you need to make amazing yogurt at home.
  •  The Triple Cream Recipe: we'll teach you how to make your own amazing triple cream yogurt
  • Perfect your yogurt: tricks to avoid grittiness, gumminess, a weak set, and other common pitfalls
  • How to select and buy yogurt culture.
  • How to strain your yogurt to make Greek yogurt.
  •  We'll end with a Question & Answer session.

Our Product


Triple Cream Greek Yogurt with 18% Milkfat

What is Triple Cream yogurt? Simply, yogurt with triple the milkfat of regular whole milk yogurts. Typical whole milk Greek yogurts have about 5% milkfat. Ours has 18%, over three times more! It's out-of-this-world delicious and, we think, more nutritious.

Simple, Real Yogurt

We only use organic dairy and live yogurt cultures. No thickeners, gums, preservatives, added sweeteners, or other junk.

Organic Dairy Means Grassfed & Pastured Cows

Organic dairy cows are required by law to get at least one-third of their food from grazing on pasture during the growing season. Fresh grazed grass in the cows' diet is essential for creating the rich, nutrient-dense cream we're so proud to make our yogurt with. Organic dairy also does not use GMO feed, antibiotics, or growth hormones.

Nutrition and Ingredients

What is Milk Protein Concentrate? All Greek yogurts are concentrated by either centrifugation (a spinning bowl, basically) or filtration systems. Because we've partnered with a small creamery who doesn't have this equipment (and it's quite expensive to purchase!), we're instead using pre-concentrated milk blended with cream and whole milk to create our Triple Cream greek yogurts. Milk protein concentrate is a form of concentrated milk that is very low in lactose. One advantage of using pre-concentrated milk is that our process generates no acid whey--a byproduct which has been a major environmental challenge for other Greek yogurt makers.

Macronutrients - Fat/Protein/Carbs

Here are the approximate macros (% of total calories) for our 18% milkfat Greek yogurt:

With 82% calories from fat, this is first and only ketogenic yogurt to be sold in the United States.

Cream

Milkfat from Grassfed Cows is a Superfood

Why make Triple Cream Yogurt and eat more milkfat?

Three words: Energy, Nutrition, Deliciousness

Safe Energy

Dairy fat is clean-burning and won't spike your blood sugar, so it's a great energy source for those looking for an alternative to carb- and sugar-rich foods. It's very low in Omega-6 polyunsaturated fat, so it won't contribute to oxidative stress and inflammation in your body (unlike soy, canola, corn, and most other vegetable oils).

Amazing Nutrients

Milkfat is rich in incredibly healthful nutrients that are hard to find elsewhere. Here are our top three:

  1. Milkfat is rich in Vitamin K2, a crucial nutrient that few have heard of and most don't get enough of. K2 prevents calcification of your arteries, supports bone and dental health, and is critical for avoiding heart disease and osteoporosis. Dairy fat is one of the few common sources of Vitamin K2--especially when the cows eat fresh green grass!
  2. Milkfat is the single best source of butyrate, a short chain fatty acid with many health benefits, which include support of digestive health and anti-inflammatory properties. (Vegetables are healthy largely because their soluble fiber is converted to butyrate and other short-chain fatty acids by beneficial gut bacteria.)
  3. Milk fat is an excellent source of conjugated linoleic acid (CLA), which has anti-cancer properties and may help with weight loss.

Deliciousness

Most Greek yogurts are chalky and pasty--but not ours. Because our Greek yogurt has more milkfat than others, it has a smooth and luxurious mouthfeel.

“Fat gives things flavor” -Julia Child

Help Us End the Tyranny of Sugar-Filled Junk Food Yogurts!

Most other yogurts contain 35-55% of calories as added sugar - no better than other junk foods. 

Our solution is the first proudly high-fat unsweetened yogurt.

What Our Fans Are Saying


"This yogurt tastes AMAZING. High in fat and non-existent in carbohydrates is a real kicker for me!”

Sami Inkinen, Ironman and triathlon world champion, co-founder of Trulia, Fat Chance Row





“You can’t even compare the taste of this yogurt to that of the brands in the stores, it’s that good! Not to mention, after a scoop you’re totally satisfied.”

Meredith Loring, co-founder of Native Life Foods, Fat Chance Row




“You think you’ve had yogurt, but this is something different. It brings creamy to a whole new level. It’s so delicious—I can’t recommend it enough!”

Kyra Davis, Director, LaunchPad Central Academic





“It’s hard to find convenient high-fat snacks. That’s why I was so excited to discover Peak Yogurt’s high-fat Greek yogurt. I love that it uses high-quality ingredients, without preservatives or sugary mix-ins.”

Niels Hoven, VP of Product Development at Pocket Gems



“The flavor and texture of Peak Yogurt is like nothing I’ve ever had. It’s the first yogurt that I find myself going back for seconds and thirds every time.”

Analisa Schelle, Sr VP at a PR firm


Worried About Saturated Fat?

Milkfat, found in cream and butter, is high in saturated fat, so it was long demonized by health authorities who recommended avoidance.

But the crusade against saturated fat was based on bad science, unscrupulous media, and political special interest groups.

Thankfully, the truth about dairy fat's healthfulness and nutrition is getting out.

A 2010 scientific review of epidemiological studies concluded "there is no significant evidence for concluding that dietary saturated fat is associated with an increased risk of [heart disease or stroke]."

Another large review study from 2014, which included randomized controlled trials, the "gold standard" of diet studies, concluded "evidence does not clearly support cardiovascular guidelines that encourage high consumption of polyunsaturated fatty acids and low consumption of total saturated fats."

Thankfully, the press is catching on, too. The best evidence? The June 12, 2014 cover of time magazine: "Eat Butter. Scientists labeled fat the enemy. Why they were wrong." 

Four powerful lines of evidence allow us to dismiss any fear of saturated fats:

  1. Humans have been eating saturated fats for hundreds of millennia. Why blame modern diseases, like heart disease, diabetes, and obesity, on a nutrient found in ancient foods? It just doesn't make sense.
  2. High-quality observational studies find no association between dietary saturated fat intake and heart disease, the ailment for which saturated fat is most commonly blamed.
  3. There are many examples of societies that consume ample saturated fat, yet enjoy robust health. For example, the French consume almost double the saturated fat of Americans, yet die only about half as often from cardiovascular heart disease.
  4. Randomized Controlled Trials completely fail to implicate saturated fat (or total fat) as a cause of disease. This type of clinical trial is considered the "Gold Standard" of scientific studies on human health because they isolate a single variable and control for interfering factors. There have been over a dozen of these studies that examine saturated fat. Not a single one of these studies showed that a reduction in saturated fat alone was beneficial.

What We Need

What the funds will support:

  • $5k Product development and scale-up work at The University of Madison, Wisconsin, where we test and perfect the manufacturing process on a smaller version of the actual commercial equipment.
  • $10k Our first two commercial batches of yogurt.

Team


Evan Sims - Founder & Chief Yogurt Maker

Rock climber, scientist, & engineer. Worked in biotech for 4.5 y before starting Peak Yogurt in 2014.

Say hello: @EvanSims_




Ella Jenkins - Brand Ambassador

Artist, harpist, &  virtuosic Renaissance Woman. Built and lives in her own Tiny House. Swims in the Pacific Ocean daily without a wetsuit.




Matt Arnold - Creative Director

Designer & denim aficionado. Masters of Architecture from California College of the Arts.





Advisors: We have a great team of four advisors with experience in consumer packaged goods, dairy, food science, entrepreneurship, marketing, and business development.

What We've Accomplished So Far

We've developed a great formula and are ready for scale-up: We've made over 100 home test batches using commercial yogurt culture, including batches meant to mimic our real commercial manufacturing process.

We've held tasting events and sampled to hundreds of people across the Bay Area. We learned a ton from getting out and sampling our product to people in real life. We tweaked and perfected our recipe based on the feedback and built a strong local fan base in the process.



We've attracted strong interest from local grocers. Here are a few of the Bay Area grocery stores we've connected with:


We've partnered with a local creamery to produce our yogurt: We've partnered with Pavel's Yogurt, in San Leandro, CA, for commercial yogurt manufacture.

We have access to a secure supply of organic milk & cream: Pavel's, our production partner, has a longstanding relationship with Clover Stornetta, our favorite Bay Area organic dairy, so we have access to a great supply of organic milk and cream.

Risks & Challenges

We've worked hard to mitigate the risks and chart a path to success. Still, any project like this has some unavoidable risk. Some worth mentioning:

  • Our first batch of commercial yogurt may not be perfect. Yogurt production at a real commercial creamery is a bit different than handmade yogurt in a home kitchen. We'll de-risk and prep to the extent we can, but our first batch or two may not exactly match our homemade stuff. 
  • Yogurt batches can fail due to contamination, poor quality, or other reasons. This would increase our startup costs and could cause delays.
  • Supply and price of organic milk and cream could present challenges.
  • Working with co-manufacturers entails certain difficulties and risks.

Thank You!

First, thank you to all of our intrepid supporters and backers! We couldn't do this without you. Special thanks to our wonderful and erudite advisors, Angelique Augereau, Beth Fryksdale, Omid Ashtari, and Brian Sambor. Shout out to our awesome videographer, Arnel Cayabyab. Super extra big Thank You to Phi Tran for her beautiful photographs. Finally, thanks to all our friends, family, and fellow food entrepreneurs who have helped us get to this stage. We thank you all and will love you forever!


Please Share Our Message

In addition to backing our campaign, you can help by spreading the word:

  • Use the Indiegogo Share Tools

  • Email our campaign link to your friends direcly.

Cheers,

Evan & the Peak Yogurt Team
story_txt:
Triple Cream Yogurt

With 100% Organic Dairy from Grassfed Cows



Peak Yogurt makes the first Triple Cream yogurts using just organic dairy and live active culture. With triple the milkfat of regular whole milk yogurts, it's the bold and delicious alternative to sugar-filled nonfat yogurts.
This campaign will fund the launch of our first product: A Greek-style yogurt with 18% milkfat made here in the San Francisco Bay Area.



"Peak Yogurt's Greek is the best yogurt I've ever tasted." -Sam Mogannam, Owner of Bi-Rite markets

Updates
Portland, OR is now a pickup location!
Shelf life: Our yogurt lasts a LONG time--at least 40 days in the fridge
In the Press
Forbes: Is This The Beginning Of The End For Nonfat Yogurt?
Bay Area Bites: Local Entrepreneur Hopes to Bring “Triple Cream” Yogurt to Market
Team Yogurt: Maker Profile | Evan Sims of Peak Yogurt
My San Francisco Kitchen: "When I tried my first bite, my mind was blown...I ate it for breakfast...and felt energized all morning." Introducing Peak Yogurt
VOX: "I found an engineer, Evan Sims, who had quit his job for a high-fat yogurt startup…His cream-infused Greek yogurt has more than twice the calories of regular "full fat" yogurt--and I consumed a tub of it weekly"  in "I lost weight by eating lots of bacon and cream. Here's a scientific explanation for why."


Yogurt Pre-Orders

How It Works

If you live in our Northern California delivery area or near one of our five pickup locations, you can be one of the first to experience our yogurt by pre-ordering through this campaign.
Follow these steps to select the right yogurt pre-order perk:
1. Select your perk size - Small, Medium, or Large



The shelf life of our product is at least 40 days (about 6 weeks). Each 24-oz container holds three 460 calorie large servings or six 230 calorie small servings. We based our estimates in the table above on one person consuming 3 large yogurt servings (or 6 small) per week. But if you love yogurt like we do, you might consume twice that amount!
2. Select Pickup or Delivery




We'll deliver anywhere in the nine Bay Area counties, plus Sacramento, Santa Cruz, and Yolo Counties. Or you can pick up your yogurt at one of five locations in California, Colorado, Oregon, and Washington state. We'll have at least three pick up dates for each location (exact dates and location address to be determined).
3. Select your perk!
Select the right perk for you and complete Indiegogo checkout process.
Not in the pickup or delivery areas?
Why not gift your pre-order to a friend who is? Or make a donation of your yogurt! Just select one of our Pickup perks and let us know that you'd like your pre-order to support a charitable donation. We're always here at hello@peakyogurt.com.
Other Great Perks
T-Shirt, $25 - Choose version #1 or #2. Ships anywhere in the U.S.



Yogurt Making Class, $99 - Make Your Own Triple Cream Yogurt!




2 hour class delivered as a live webinar, recording available afterward.
Learn the secrets to making amazing homemade yogurt from Evan Sims, the founder of Peak Yogurt.
What we'll cover:


Overview of history, biochemistry, and microbiology of yogurt.

How to make yogurt! Everything you need to make amazing yogurt at home.

 The Triple Cream Recipe: we'll teach you how to make your own amazing triple cream yogurt

Perfect your yogurt: tricks to avoid grittiness, gumminess, a weak set, and other common pitfalls

How to select and buy yogurt culture.

How to strain your yogurt to make Greek yogurt.

 We'll end with a Question & Answer session.






Our Product







Triple Cream Greek Yogurt with 18% Milkfat

What is Triple Cream yogurt? Simply, yogurt with triple the milkfat of regular whole milk yogurts. Typical whole milk Greek yogurts have about 5% milkfat. Ours has 18%, over three times more! It's out-of-this-world delicious and, we think, more nutritious.
Simple, Real Yogurt


We only use organic dairy and live yogurt cultures. No thickeners, gums, preservatives, added sweeteners, or other junk.
Organic Dairy Means Grassfed & Pastured Cows


Organic dairy cows are required by law to get at least one-third of their food from grazing on pasture during the growing season. Fresh grazed grass in the cows' diet is essential for creating the rich, nutrient-dense cream we're so proud to make our yogurt with. Organic dairy also does not use GMO feed, antibiotics, or growth hormones.

Nutrition and Ingredients



What is Milk Protein Concentrate? All Greek yogurts are concentrated by either centrifugation (a spinning bowl, basically) or filtration systems. Because we've partnered with a small creamery who doesn't have this equipment (and it's quite expensive to purchase!), we're instead using pre-concentrated milk blended with cream and whole milk to create our Triple Cream greek yogurts. Milk protein concentrate is a form of concentrated milk that is very low in lactose. One advantage of using pre-concentrated milk is that our process generates no acid whey--a byproduct which has been a major environmental challenge for other Greek yogurt makers.
Macronutrients - Fat/Protein/Carbs
Here are the approximate macros (% of total calories) for our 18% milkfat Greek yogurt:





With 82% calories from fat, this is first and only ketogenic yogurt to be sold in the United States.


Cream

Milkfat from Grassfed Cows is a Superfood





Why make Triple Cream Yogurt and eat more milkfat?
Three words: Energy, Nutrition, Deliciousness
Safe Energy

Dairy fat is clean-burning and won't spike your blood sugar, so it's a great energy source for those looking for an alternative to carb- and sugar-rich foods. It's very low in Omega-6 polyunsaturated fat, so it won't contribute to oxidative stress and inflammation in your body (unlike soy, canola, corn, and most other vegetable oils).
Amazing Nutrients

Milkfat is rich in incredibly healthful nutrients that are hard to find elsewhere. Here are our top three:




Milkfat is rich in Vitamin K2, a crucial nutrient that few have heard of and most don't get enough of. K2 prevents calcification of your arteries, supports bone and dental health, and is critical for avoiding heart disease and osteoporosis. Dairy fat is one of the few common sources of Vitamin K2--especially when the cows eat fresh green grass!


Milkfat is the single best source of butyrate, a short chain fatty acid with many health benefits, which include support of digestive health and anti-inflammatory properties. (Vegetables are healthy largely because their soluble fiber is converted to butyrate and other short-chain fatty acids by beneficial gut bacteria.)


Milk fat is an excellent source of conjugated linoleic acid (CLA), which has anti-cancer properties and may help with weight loss.



Deliciousness


Most Greek yogurts are chalky and pasty--but not ours. Because our Greek yogurt has more milkfat than others, it has a smooth and luxurious mouthfeel.

“Fat gives things flavor” -Julia Child
Help Us End the Tyranny of Sugar-Filled Junk Food Yogurts!



Most other yogurts contain 35-55% of calories as added sugar - no better than other junk foods. 
Our solution is the first proudly high-fat unsweetened yogurt.



What Our Fans Are Saying



"This yogurt tastes AMAZING. High in fat and non-existent in carbohydrates is a real kicker for me!”
Sami Inkinen, Ironman and triathlon world champion, co-founder of Trulia, Fat Chance Row





“You can’t even compare the taste of this yogurt to that of the brands in the stores, it’s that good! Not to mention, after a scoop you’re totally satisfied.”
Meredith Loring, co-founder of Native Life Foods, Fat Chance Row



“You think you’ve had yogurt, but this is something different. It brings creamy to a whole new level. It’s so delicious—I can’t recommend it enough!”
Kyra Davis, Director, LaunchPad Central Academic





“It’s hard to find convenient high-fat snacks. That’s why I was so excited to discover Peak Yogurt’s high-fat Greek yogurt. I love that it uses high-quality ingredients, without preservatives or sugary mix-ins.”
Niels Hoven, VP of Product Development at Pocket Gems


“The flavor and texture of Peak Yogurt is like nothing I’ve ever had. It’s the first yogurt that I find myself going back for seconds and thirds every time.”
Analisa Schelle, Sr VP at a PR firm




Worried About Saturated Fat?

Milkfat, found in cream and butter, is high in saturated fat, so it was long demonized by health authorities who recommended avoidance.

But the crusade against saturated fat was based on bad science, unscrupulous media, and political special interest groups.

Humans have been eating saturated fats for hundreds of millennia. Why blame modern diseases, like heart disease, diabetes, and obesity, on a nutrient found in ancient foods? It just doesn't make sense.

High-quality observational studies find no association between dietary saturated fat intake and heart disease, the ailment for which saturated fat is most commonly blamed.

There are many examples of societies that consume ample saturated fat, yet enjoy robust health. For example, the French consume almost double the saturated fat of Americans, yet die only about half as often from cardiovascular heart disease. 

Randomized Controlled Trials completely fail to implicate saturated fat (or total fat) as a cause of disease. This type of clinical trial is considered the "Gold Standard" of scientific studies on human health because they isolate a single variable and control for interfering factors. There have been over a dozen of these studies that examine saturated fat. Not a single one of these studies showed that a reduction in saturated fat alone was beneficial.

Team

Rock climber, scientist, & engineer. Worked in biotech for 4.5 y before starting Peak Yogurt in 2014.
Say hello: @EvanSims_

story:
We are K2 Medical Alerts

We are Mothers to teenage son's with autism. One of our biggest fears has always been, "What would happen to our boys if something happened to us" We had to do something that would give law enforcement and first responders a tool to help our boys if we were injured and unable to speak on their behalf. Do you have those worries, or know someone that does? Whether its Autism or Diabetes, Alzheimers or any other medical condition or disability, our A.S.A.P. kit can provide you peace of mind and help first responders help you or your loved one.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $25,000!

We aim to have our Alert for Special Assistance Program recognized nationwide. One universal system that is the same in every state. So if you travel from where you live to somewhere across the country, and an emergency happens, law enforcement and first responders will still know how to help you in the best way possible. We are at the tip of our marketing campaign, and taking this across the country is a huge endeavor, but we are not stopping until it happens. To date we have received enormous support for our project and our goal. A.S.A.P was sent state wide to all 99 county Sheriff's Department's in Iowa last week. State Police and City Police Chiefs are sharing the details with their forces and incorporating A.S.A.P. into their training! How amazing is that!! We continue to send samples and brochures to law enforcement and EMS, with your help we can reach across the country even faster. Sending all our information to thousands of agencies across the country adds up, as well as printing thousands of brochures and completed A.S.A.P. kits. We have so much to accomplish in the next few months, with your help we can do it! Join us to make A.S.A.P. Alert for Special Assistance Program known in every town, city and rural community across the country. When ever you see it on the road, you'll be able to say..." I helped make that happen!"

Our perks include complete kits that you can use for yourself or even contribute so you can help a friend or family member that struggles with a disability or disease. You will also be helping us get the information to law enforcement and first responders across the country. Not only are you helping yourself or a loved one, but will also be helping make the job of law enforcement and first responders a little easier. You could also be recognized on our website as someone who helped make this possible!

If we don't make our goal, we can still do great things with the funds we do raise, we can still get the message out to as many areas as possible. Even if we only reach half of the U.S.A. that means we are half way there! Thats progress!

The Impact

The peace of mind our product can make to someone is priceless. We feel it, because we live it.... Knowing that those urgent pieces of information are with us and our children every day takes a great burdon off our shoulders. We know that our boys will be taken care of in the best possible way, and that is a blessing to us. Raising children with disabilities changes everything about who you think you are, and you become someone you never thought you could be. We want to be a part of giving people with medical needs and special needs, and their caretakers a little less to worry about.

We give back to our community by organizing a Special Needs Easter Egg Hunt every year, and we love it. We like being a part of something bigger than us, when we started that event 8 years ago we had a small field full of eggs, 8 years later we get donations from people as far away as California and nationally recognized organizations donate and help in the field. Our small field full of eggs became a huge field full of eggs and prizes galore. So we know how something can grow if you put your heart into it!

This came to life when I was almost hit by another driver on the highway while I had my autistic son with me. It was a very close call and by Gods grace we managed to avoid that oncoming car. Here at K2 Medical Alerts we began to talk about what we could do to help in the event of something like that happening. How we could help our families, other families, law enforcement and first responders. Thinking about how afraid our children would be broke our hearts. My son is non-verbal, so he'd not even be able to communicate his name or who to call in case of emergencies. Now with A.S.A.P. on our vehicles, those who need to know, will know, and words can't describe how uplifting that feels for us. 

Risks & Challenges

We understand there will be challenges, but we face challenges every day. When you strive to do something that will make a difference in peoples lives, every challenge and risk is worth it. It may take us months to get our program across the country but we are dedicated. So far we have had nothing but positive feedback and support and we will continue to pursue that. There is no reward without risk, and no excitement without challenge! 

Everyday we watch our children take risks and battle the challenges, what they have to deal with just to get through a day is enormous sometimes. They have taught us a great deal about life, character, dedication and love. Our company lives by those things. Being a voice for those who may not have one, or who struggle to be heard is something we do everyday. 

If we come across big challenges, we can regroup and pursue a different approach, but this is worth every possible challenge we could come across.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't contribute, thats ok, there is another way you can help if you'd still like to be a part of our campaign. Send us an email with your mailing address and we will send you information on our program that you can take to your local law enforcement, and first responder organizations. One person can do amazing things, and we would love your help!

story:
My mom taught me to believe in the goodness in people, in God and in miracles. 
 
She needs a miracle now.
 
For years I have watched her put others before herself. As a single mom, things were never easy for her but she always made sure I was taken care of. I'm in my last year of college to become an engineer and I have her to thank for encouraging me to dream big dreams. 
 
Her dream has always been to touch lives through her writing. And she has, publishing 9 books (which she was nominated for the Christy and Gold Medallion in fiction), ghostwriting the Bethany Hamilton "Soul Surfer" series, writing and producing a music video with Randy Travis, a short film that won as a finalist with Tribecca and launching "The Watcher Chronicles"; an angel war series with Harper Collins/Zondervan and her latest work "A Mile In His Shoes", a Christmas movie set in Nashville.
 
She has done all of this while being hit with her brother's death, taking care of her father who was injured in the war until he passed ,her mother and most recently, moving her grandparents in to take care of them.
 
 She has helped so many people...I am writing this because I hope that you will see her like I do and help her.
 
After four attacks of Diverticulitis in a year and a half and no medical insurance, she has run out of resources and time. 
 
After being rushed to the hospital last month, she was told she has to have this surgery or she might not make it through another attack. 
 
So what is this campaign about?
 
1. I've set up this site to ask for donations to help her with medical bills, prescriptions and living expenses as she recovers from surgery. Please donate whatever is in your heart. Every little bit counts!
 
2. Please join me in PRAYER, that my mom makes a full recovery and that all of her needs are met. Even if you aren't able to donate, please help by sharing her story with others that can help.
 
3. If you or anyone you know is in a position to invest in her dream, please share this with them as well. I believe in her and so do a lot of her fans. Her greatest dream is to bring her angel war series to the big screen. Something that has never been done before!
 
Who knows, in helping my mom you might just be helping make movie history, too!
 
Thanks for your time, prayers, donations and spreading the word!
 
God Bless, 
Mitch Miller
story_txt:
My mom taught me to believe in the goodness in people, in God and in miracles. 
 
She needs a miracle now.
 
For years I have watched her put others before herself. As a single mom, things were never easy for her but she always made sure I was taken care of. I'm in my last year of college to become an engineer and I have her to thank for encouraging me to dream big dreams. 
 
Her dream has always been to touch lives through her writing. And she has, publishing 9 books (which she was nominated for the Christy and Gold Medallion in fiction), ghostwriting the Bethany Hamilton "Soul Surfer" series, writing and producing a music video with Randy Travis, a short film that won as a finalist with Tribecca and launching "The Watcher Chronicles"; an angel war series with Harper Collins/Zondervan and her latest work "A Mile In His Shoes", a Christmas movie set in Nashville.
 
She has done all of this while being hit with her brother's death, taking care of her father who was injured in the war until he passed ,her mother and most recently, moving her grandparents in to take care of them.
 
 She has helped so many people...I am writing this because I hope that you will see her like I do and help her.
 
After four attacks of Diverticulitis in a year and a half and no medical insurance, she has run out of resources and time. 
 
After being rushed to the hospital last month, she was told she has to have this surgery or she might not make it through another attack. 
 
So what is this campaign about?
 
1. I've set up this site to ask for donations to help her with medical bills, prescriptions and living expenses as she recovers from surgery. Please donate whatever is in your heart. Every little bit counts!
 
2. Please join me in PRAYER, that my mom makes a full recovery and that all of her needs are met. Even if you aren't able to donate, please help by sharing her story with others that can help.
 
3. If you or anyone you know is in a position to invest in her dream, please share this with them as well. I believe in her and so do a lot of her fans. Her greatest dream is to bring her angel war series to the big screen. Something that has never been done before!
 
Who knows, in helping my mom you might just be helping make movie history, too!
 
Thanks for your time, prayers, donations and spreading the word!
 
God Bless, 
Mitch Miller

story:
Breathing is at the center of physical and mental health, fitness and performance


The BreathAcoustic headset and companion apps will improve the quality of life for millions by:  

  • Keeping people healthy, happy and fit,
  • Detecting respiratory and cardiac stress levels before they become acute, and by
  • Helping those with physical and emotional ailments recover to their fullest potential.

Since 2004, BreathResearch has been developing research and technology that uses acoustic sensors to analyze the quality of a person’s breathing. Our audio processing and analysis of over 10.000 sessions has led to a very sophisticated breath analysis framework that successfully extracts new information about the characteristics of the breath cycle and its phases and the correlations to health and wellness, sports and fitness testing, sleep and cardio-pulmonary care.

The most recent version of our mobile app, MyBreath Lite, measures and tracks breathing and has been selected to be part of Aetna’s CarePass mobile health platform. 

Our goal for building the BreathAcoustic All-in-One Headset is to provide more accurate and comprehensive health information and feedback in a truly wearable product that looks and feels good on the outside and is high tech and performance driven on the inside. We understand that design, performance and usability are key to engaging the most amount of people and their loved ones in their health and well-being.

Features of the BreathAcoustic Headset

  • Acoustic breath pattern analysis (rate, depth, tension, wheeze, apnea and more)
  • Heart Rate
  • Pulse Oximetry (blood oxygen levels)
  • Altitude
  • Barometric Pressure (often relates to mood, pain and memory)
  • Cardio-pulmonary Exercise Testing (early detection of acute pulmonary and cardiac events)
  • Metabolic Testing (max fat burning capacity and max aerobic capacity)

You'll be able to find out your exercise and metabolic thresholds and your optimal level of relaxation. 

An All-Around Quality Headset for Every Application

  • Adjustable, comfortable, lightweight and portable
  • Quality noise-reducing microphone and earphones
  • Retracting capability for adjustable microphone placement
  • Enhanced usability features to listen to music and answer calls
  • Wireless connection via Bluetooth™ to be used as a normal headset for quality audio reproduction and recording with any bluetooth-enabled device
  • Extra sensors expand the health and fitness capabilities
  • Beautiful minimalistic design

A Suite of Companion Apps

We'll be creating a suite of engaging and easy-to-use apps (mobile and desktop) to help you improve health, fitness and performance. 

We'll do all the complex data gathering and analysis in the background. You touch a button and get the relevant information and guidance that you are interested in.

In addition, we will be creating apps for professionals to use in clinics, athletic facilities, and other health and fitness settings.

Targeted Treatment and Training

Together with our partner, HeartZones USA, we’ll create personalized health and fitness recommendations to help you:

  • Alleviate stress
  • Improve athletic performance
  • Achieve weight loss goals
  • Get better sleep

Research and Development

A study at the University of Wisconsin-LaCrosse demonstrated that acoustic analysis of breathing, using BreathResearch's technology appears to be a viable surrogate for the measurement of gas exchange to determine metabolic ventilatory thresholds (maximum fat burning capacity and maximum aerobic capacity). 

Another study validates that the quality of the information collected and measured with BreathResearch's acoustics technology correlates to a standard airflow monitor. 

The BreathAcoustic headset and platform will offer new possibilities of research and treatment in:

  • Mind-Body Medicine
  • Enhanced Athletic Performance
  • Sleep
  • Home CardioPulmonary Care

Calling All Developers

In the future, developers will be able to create new applications for the BreathAcoustics headset and platform, using the upcoming revolutionary BreathResearch API.                                                    

                                                     

BreathResearch began in 2004 when Nirinjan Yee, Founder/CEO began experimenting with electronically amplifying and recording breathing sounds of patients with chronic health conditions and athletes wanting to maximize their performance and recovery. By studying each person's breathing patterns, she was able to identify specific qualities of the breath cycle that could indicate optimal or suboptimal health and performance. With a little bit of guidance, both patients and athletes were able to breathe with greater ease and in their full capacity, thereby reducing stress, decreasing symptoms and improving performance. Read an Interview Article

Our Team:

CEO/Founder: Nirinjan Yee

Acoustic Engineers: Haris Stamatopoulos M.S and Panagiotis Giotis M.S.

Clinical Exercise Physiologist: Carl Foster, Ph.D

Heart Zones Training and Sports Performance: Sally Edwards, M.S. 

Design: Zeus Estudio Digital

Video Production: Illumina Studios

Server Architecture: Mark Soloway, M.S. and Stuart Schmukler, M.S.

Use of Funds

The funds raised will be used for making the BreathAcoustic All-in-One Headset. Since this campaign has been live, we have been approached by companies worldwide who would like to distribute the headset. We need your help to build it.

Hardware

We will be partnering with one of the top companies in industrial design to build the headset. We will choose the best acoustic and optic sensors and a light, comfortable and resilient material for the headset. 

Software

We’ll create a suite of engaging and easy-to-use apps.  All of the apps will be synced to our sever so that people can access all of their data in any one or all of our apps.

Patents

Some of the funds will also go to processing pending patents and converting a provisional patent for the headset into a final patent. 

Future Plans

Medical

We will be partnering with a university research hospital to do a pilot study using the BreathAcoustic headset to perform home Cardio-Pulmonary Exercise testing (CPET). CPET is one the most successful methods used for early detection of respiratory and cardiac events but currently requires the patient to go to the Pulmonary Function Lab. A home CPET test could saves lives, improve quality of life and reduce health care costs significantly.

With the completion of the pilot study, we will apply for FDA approval and insurance reimbursement. 

Underserved Communities

Once we complete our pilot study, we would like to embed our technology into a low cost mobile headset and device to help save lives and improve quality of life in underserved communities worldwide.

Become a part of this exciting new journey into optimal health and fitness and contribute today!

story:
South Carolina currently ranks 48th in state health rankings, only ahead of Mississippi and Louisiana. For example, South Carolina has alarmingly high rates of high blood pressure, cardiovascular disease, and Type II Diabetes. The state also ranks first in lower limb amputations from Diabetes! One of the major risk factors for each of these serious health conditions is obesity.

Children in America currently face having shorter life expectancies than their parents due this every growing epidemic. In fact, two of every five (39.1%) children in South Carolina are either overweight or obese. These life-threatening combinations are even more exaggerated in the areas of our community that have a lower socioeconomic status. Implementing health and wellness programs have the potential to make enormous impacts on the health of our community, but would also positively impact our economy in South Carolina. According to SCDHEC, working to decrease the prevalence of obesity at today's levels, South Carolina tax payers would save $858 per adult in 2018, totaling $3 billion!

Be Your Own Champion is a health and wellness program created and designed by HopeHealth, Inc., a nonprofit federally qualified health center that services the Pee Dee region and parts of eastern South Carolina. The goal of HopeHealth’s Be Your Own Champion program is to empower patients suffering from chronic and acute illnesses to change their health behaviors. As a result, this program can help improve health outcomes related to obesity, cardiovascular disease, and Type II Diabetes through the fusing of wellness, exercise and conventional health care. Participants (Champions) of Be Your Own Champion will be enrolled into a twelve month program that consists of being monitored by a physician and being referred to a partnering wellness center. The physician, the Champion and the wellness center work closely together to tailor the program specifically to the needs of each Champion. 

Unfortunately, statistics show a correlation between low socioeconomic status and chronic disease. People who could benefit from our program are unable to pay for memberships for this life-saving intervention. THIS IS HOW YOU CAN HELP! This funding platform allows you to become a "Wellness Angel" by sponsoring a scholarship for a Champion who otherwise would be unable to participate. Your sponsorship will improve health status; and, in many cases save the life of one of our Champions.

A sponsorship of $300 will provide an annual scholarship for one of our Champions. Partial sponsorships are also appreciated and welcomed. HopeHealth invites you to join them in their mission to improve the health statuses of those who need it most. And, always remember that with HOPE... ALL things are possible.

story:
On February 10th of this year, our sponsored girl, Mora, was involved in a serious motorcycle accident.  She suffered four broken teeth and numerous facial injuries.  The Cambodia Education Assistance Fund has provided funds to get her teeth repaired but now she faces upcoming surgeries to repair her face.  Mora is one of six girls our foundation sponsors to attend a university.  She comes from an extremely poor rural family in Kampong Chhang Province north of Phnom Penh.  Presently she is in her first year at Pannasastra University studying English.  Beginning her second year, she will pursue a degree in International Relations.

Now that the initial swelling has subsided from her face it is time to think about reconstructive facial surgery.  As you can see from the picture, The scar tissue on her upper lip must be replaced with a graft of skin from somewhere else on her body and her upper lip resized and repositioned.  All of this is possible to do in the skilled hands of a cosmetic surgeon—we have been assured of that.  The problem however, is the cost.  Facing multiple surgeries over several months, the estimated cost approaches $9,500.  This is far more than the budget of our foundation can afford hence, we need your help!.  It is unreasonable to ask only four or five generous individuals to underwrite this major financial need so, instead, I am hoping that by putting this plea on Indiegogo, there will be many of you touched by Mora's plight and will donate to the fund which will be used exclusively for Mora's medical costs.  We are setting up a special trust fund for that purpose.  It is not that Mora just needs a pretty face again.  What is in play here is her future.  With a disfigured face, who would hire her regardless of her education and training?  What would be her chances of having a husband and ultimately a family?  In Cambodia her chances of living a normal happy life are few if any with a disfigured face such as you see in the picture.  So, we MUST help her by raising enough funds so she can indeed have the corrective surgery which will restore much or all of her natural beauty.Yes, it is true, Mora lives some 8000 miles away from most of us but what would you do if she were your daughter?  Would you just say, "It's too expensive so we will do nothing!" or would you try everything you could in any way you can to raise the funds necessary for her surgery.  I am hoping you will become at least temporarily, part of our team in the fund-raising effort by not only participating yourself but urging your relatives, friends, and neighbors to get involved in helping us with this project.  As you know, the more who donate, the less burden it will be for all.  If 200 people would each give $50, we would meet our goal.  Nowadays, that is probably less than the cost of one night's dinner out for a couple.

story:
We would like to request your support for a fast-growing sport in Germany. We are a Select Rugby Team called ‘The Cruisers’, based in Germany and comprising of players from both Germany (including national Squad players) and the traditional rugby playing countries, such as, England, South Africa and Australia.
After our success last year, where we finished second at the International Munich Sevens tournament, we are now looking to raise our profile and the profile of rugby in Germany and to adopt a more professional approach.Unlike, the traditional rugby playing nations, rugby is still a minority sport in Germany, thus, making funding a difficult prospect. We have therefore found that this is the only possible platform which can help us to reach our goals.

We would therefore like to ask if you would consider sponsoring our team. This money would be used as a basis for forming a successful sevens touring team, and to build up a strong network for the future.

Due to the nature of Rugby sevens, it is a tournament based game, with this in mind there are always many teams, and fans watching the events, however, it has the concomitant affect of high travel expenses. Our first calander event this year: The International Munich Sevens tournament alone features on average 22 Teams with around 250 players and many spectators (see links) 

The cruisers squad – Munich Sevens 2012
http://picasaweb.google.com/117346201539832505042/OktoberfestSevens2012#5799154901374561618

Munich sevens 2013
http://www.munich-rugby.de/Joomla/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=51&Itemid=57

Rugby Sevens is to be introduced as a new sport in the next Olympic games and is already becoming more popular due to its Olympic connections We really hope that you will take this opportunity to be associated with an exciting and fast growing sport by considering this application and becoming our sponsor

Thank you for your support!

story:
Let me tell you about my Aunt Sue. For my whole life, she's been one of the warmest people in my life. Always brightening up rooms with her smile, family gatherings never quite seemed complete until she would get there.

Three years ago, she was diagnosed with cancer. It's been a long fight, and her strength, even in the face of unimaginable pain and hardship, continues to amaze me every single day.

Inspired by her courage, my cousins and I wanted to immortalize her battle in ink on our bodies. We want to get the lavender cancer ribbon. Instead, we decided to turn what would have been simple tattoos into a campaign to raise money for a cause close to our hearts.

By the weekend of Saturday April 19th (tattoo day), we hope to have raised $5000. All of the money raised will be donated to the Canadian Cancer Society. This money goes to pay for important research being done. Cultures of cancerous cells for lab research aren't cheap, and neither is equipment, power, or the time of researchers. The tattoos will be paid for out-of-pocket and not from the donation money.

We don't really have much to offer you, except for our time. I'll do more consulting with my cousins, but as it stands now, I'm willing to accept REASONABLE dares for certain donation sizes. For instance, if you give me the name of a song and make a, say, $30 donation, I will film myself breaking out into song and singing that particular song in the middle of a 600-person lecture. Or, if you describe an instance of somebody doing wrong by you and make a, say, $35 donation, I will write and record a personalized "revenge rap/song" to help you express your outrage.

Again, more perks will be created in time.


According to the 2013 Canadian Cancer Statistics, 2 in 5 Canadians will develop cancer in their lifetimes and 1 in 4 will die from it. You can help. Stand with us. Research makes a real tangible difference, please enable them to do the work that has the potential to save thousands of lives per year.


In addition to making donations, you can help by liking/sharing/tweeting the hell out of this, and by providing donation perks. If you're willing to donate your time and efforts to making the prospect of donation more appealing to people, we would welcome it deeply.

Remember... together we can beat cancer. Stand with us and fight. Raise money for the cure.

The tattoos will be paid for out-of-pocket and not from the donation money.We don't really have much to offer you, except for our time. I'll do more consulting with my cousins, but as it stands now, I'm willing to accept REASONABLE dares for certain donation sizes. For instance, if you give me the name of a song and make a, say, $30 donation, I will film myself breaking out into song and singing that particular song in the middle of a 600-person lecture. Or, if you describe an instance of somebody doing wrong by you and make a, say, $35 donation, I will write and record a personalized "revenge rap/song" to help you express your outrage.Again, more perks will be created in time.According to the 2013 Canadian Cancer Statistics, 2 in 5 Canadians will develop cancer in their lifetimes and 1 in 4 will die from it. You can help. Stand with us. Research makes a real tangible difference, please enable them to do the work that has the potential to save thousands of lives per year.In addition to making donations, you can help by liking/sharing/tweeting the hell out of this, and by providing donation perks. If you're willing to donate your time and efforts to making the prospect of donation more appealing to people, we would welcome it deeply.Remember... together we can beat cancer. Stand with us and fight. Raise money for the cure.

story:
Bust My Hinges Off: a Trans Narrative.

This July marks a tremendous shift in my narrative—a physical and metaphysical crossing over from one body into another and from one lifestyle to a new one. After a long awaited life altering surgery my month long recovery blurs into the start of my career as a high school English teacher. As my body shifts into the androgyny I most intimately identify with my family will transition (finally) into the first secure rung of middle class that for too long felt unreachable. Though I won’t be rolling in it, I will have a stable income and real healthcare. Unfortunately, this long awaited benefit does not come with the coverage for top surgery. I, however, am determined to begin this new version of my life in the gender expression that is truest for me.

Becoming outwardly the self I’ve always known to be inwardly feels like the sensation you get when you thought for sure you were wrong, or for sure you failed the test, and suddenly find out that actually you were right and you aced the test after all. Do you know that feeling? It’s the closest simile I’ve got for you.

In order to support my family (my two amazing kiddos) through this transition, both financially and emotionally, I am seeking the help of my near and far community. As part of this process I am holding an epic salon café at my home in Portland, Oregon where I’ll be reading from my self-published book, Both/Neither: a poemior unchests.  These poems, essays, and vignettes have unraveled from me over the course of the last 12 years.

This campaign provides a space for locals to buy entry tickets to the salon café and for those of you dear and far to pre-purchase the book and/or support my transition through donations that award other goodies.

Any money that I make above the cost of my surgery ($7500) will go to a scholarship fund (handled by the lovely folks of Pervert the Cirque) for future folks seeking support with their trans related medical needs.

A sampler of some work from Both/Neither:

Excerpt from “Disembodied  [• adj. serrated from or existing without the body.]  Dysphoria  [• n. a state of unease or general dissatisfaction–ORIGIN from Gk dusphoros ‘hard to bear.’]”

*

What does a man feel like in a man’s body? What is my body? Or another question. Imagine you are always wrong. My cunt dropped its crowbar on 6th street down a block from the yard of mulch and weeds. Day spent soaked down into my pair-of-socks balls.

Allow me to ask how does your body feel today. Am I my body or just feeling? Space holding when I should be protruding into [my pants].

A cunt is a trouble to hold [on to]. What is a man body anyway? My body snuffed out a boy before a man developed to protect himself. Now, now, a body can be rewritten—can’t it?

*

Somedays I am made of force and sometimes barely water. Oh, I forget. Water easily consumes a landscape, remembering, evidence, a body.

Water takes only the shape of its container. Water holds up my body despite everything.

I have no proof just feelings to scrub out.

*

Boy next door asks why I am bare-chested on a hot summer day. I am five-years-old and light up larger to yell I look just like you, my fist shaking, then quieter I am just like you. Children don’t know whom to believe: parents, each other, themselves. Gender is emotional or it’s physiological or it isn’t safe to believe in. Even the most loyal and surest, most valiant parading selves feel betrayed.

*

People from childhood fade like old Polaroid photos left in the sun but I can easily see Gavin and Nick and me. Our bodies shifting against concrete stoops and short terrace walls. Our hands flitter between the edges of our jeans’ buttons and our pockets. One hand in a pocket another at the zipper, one hand between the legs another twisting its palm against the concrete. One hand. All you need is one hand to drop your pants with, maybe another to pull your calvin’s down. “Come on, show me.” You first. “No, you.” Pause. “What’er you fraid?” Am not. You are. Dummy.

*

[Oh child, yes am frayed.]

*

The following poem was first published in the anthology Troubling the Line: Trans & Genderqueer Poetry and Poetics:

Poetics Statement for the Undeclared

/

I have a hard time making a fixed statement about anything. [Even gender] I’m not one

to get fully on any wagon though I am good at getting going. [I fidget and collage] Perhaps

this roots up out of not having

a box to check on forms of existence, application, permission.

I can’t even choose a genre. [I mean gender] Texts out of me won’t just

poem themselves. My textuality takes a little

from over here and up there or back then. I can only hope

readers dissipate stiff edges [mine holdfast and push and shove]

get limber in my versions. Let me try to say it

like so. I write [I mean blur] poemoirs,

wrestle language and grammar, truth and fiction, into pluralities. [Everything genders]

A maker of questions, I write to go, [I mean fuck]

to experience disembodiment, to expand a universe or two. [My own type of]

Dispelling any notion that language is enough to make with.

//

I don’t end neatly in my skin or ink, but I work at it, work with large objects and slippery cairns found at random while walking about, this is just how dreaming happens once the brain’s assured there’s no danger, didn’t you know, sleep is dangerous, mallards and dolphins and even lizards know and metallica too, singing the kingdom out of their masterful chests, while I write my way back, back into a shape I can recognize and name, O, all too often I am left speechless and winging my way, khrg, I promised myself I’d make a statement already, how hard can it be, isn’t this how genders become a period

///

Does the period make the statement or the statement the period?

Text is another noun for body. When the body is wrong, revise it.

My body, my text. My transtextuality.

Won’t you read, O please, me either way?

////

If it is with language that we find each other, name what cannot be explained or question what is supposedly certain, than absolutely it is through language that we work to overcome what is mangled in us, in each other, in the world.

Our alphabet weighs paperthin-weight. No, we cannot fatten properly on word alone. Why certain truths make a stillbirth. This biting desire to write then must be a form of natural selection. The stickiest cells keeping time keep touching each other. Well, Jack, this is my ode to you.

////

Let me ask how does your body feel today.

Am I my body or just feeling?

I have no proof just my open palms.

Only my sweat.

story:
We deliver delicious, super-food green smoothies to working professionals in the office.

Unlike Jamba Juice & Naked, we are not afraid of nutrition. We substitute fruits & greens for sugar, and our blends are as delicious as they are good for you.

How many times have you left your house in the morning hungry after skipping breakfast (again)? A quality breakfast is critical to starting the day, yet many of us simply run out of time to prepare anything substantial. Furthermore, our health and well-being is increasingly threatened as we consume large amounts of unnatural processed food and unhealthy ready-made meals.

Food is the fuel that we run on, and we believe that filling our customer’s bodies with premium fuel (high quality, nutritious green smoothies) will significantly contribute to their health and well-being.  It is our vision that these delicious green smoothies will positively alter our customer’s relationship with food, particularly vegetables, and restore a connection to the food they put into their bodies.

Our current customers are working professionals who realize they need to improve their eating habits, but don’t have the time and/or energy to prepare everything themselves.

To reach them, we offer free smoothie parties to offices in the Tempe area. We blend together our delicious “Maui Mint” smoothie, and bring free samples to all the employees. We are able to use this platform as an opportunity to educate on the health benefits of going-green.

We'd like to spice this party up a bit, however, with a full-on margarita (filled with smoothie) backpack! So this campaign is set for $1,000 to help fund the purchase of a party pack as we get more opportunities to make healthy eating fun for everyone!


Our Story

We fell in love with green smoothies while training for the Ironman triathlon in 2013. Training, while working a full schedule, didn't exactly leave much extra time. But nutrition was a critical component that could not be ignored. Green smoothies allowed for the fastest, most efficient way to get all the nutritional super-foods we needed on a daily basis. Now, we can't imagine life without smoothies, and want to share them with the Valley!



The Impact

Nutrition problems are bigger than we initially anticipated. Obesity and heart disease are deadly killers, and working professionals are starting to take notice. For a long time, green smoothies have been a secret of elite athletes, but with Whole Foods making them available, they are now going mainstream.

With hundreds of offices throughout the valley, and long, hot summers, Phoenix is the ideal location.

PepsiCo recently settled a lawsuit involving its brand Naked Juice for $9 million, admitting that its products weren't “all natural,” despite being advertised as such on each bottle. Our goal is to educate our customers that after the pasteurization process, these brightly packaged juices, the ones that can sit for weeks in a truck without being refrigerated, are about as rich in nutrients as a pack of “natural” gummy bears. In other words– they are left with sugar. Lots & lots of sugar. You can read more here.

It's time we have a legitimately healthy green drink that is nutritious, delicious, and affordable!

Website: GoBlend.it

story:
Our Story

My name is Abdo Hajj, I am 19 years old and a film student. . My father, John Hajj, was diagnosed with diabetes when he was 23 years old and had many health problems since, about 5 years ago we were so thrilled to hear that his medical conditions were stable (diabetes, clogged arterys, etc.), but unfortunately his stability was only temporary. My father fell 4 years ago on Christmas day from a heart attack, doctors told us that his kidneys stopped working and all the toxins were clogging his major arteries to his heart. In other words he had just barely dodged death. Since his kidneys failed he has been on dialysis 5 times a week, just recently his nurse who comes to the house to take care of him said,"You will be needing to do 6 days a week,". Those of you who have family members in the house who are constantly on dialysis could understand the difficulties of it. My father had to stop working and that has left my mother all alone working to take care of 3 kids while they further their education. Unfortunately its been my fathers 4th Christmas on dialysis and all I ever see is him losing hope-- that he'll get a kidney. Those of you that know, dialysis is only a temporary fix and it will save his life meanwhile, until we find him a kidney. They estimated that in 15 years he will be eligible for a transplant, but doctor says that he can only be on the machine for 10 years considering his condition. My family has looked long and hard for my father to receive a kidney and we have found many relatives around the world willing to give their kidneys, problem is, we don't have the money to do it. My family cannot afford 60,000 dollars for the transplant. I am doing anything and everything in my power to get that money. Please help us out if you can, I understand the difficulties in the economy and I promise every single dollar can make a difference. 

The Impact

I am going to find a way to get my father a kidney, I am going to document my journey and eventually make it a feature film. If this fails, I have about 5 years to do so, so time keeps ticking. I refuse to lose hope.


What We Need & What You Get

The total cost would be about 60,000 dollars, we are looking for at least 40,000 dollars. If the money is not met, I will end my college career take whatever I have and work for the rest. The money will be going into a secure savings account for "The John Hajj Fund Raiser". I will be uploading clips of my dad very shortly so you can meet the man yourself. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell a friend to tell a friend. If anyone is sharing a similar situation please feel free to message me and I would love to help you on your journey as well. Thank you all for listening.

story:
Short Summary

Trustin is an upbeat 5 year old who has a tumor in the left side of his chest that is crushing his lung, leaving only his right lung functioning and heart pushed to the right side of his chest. Trustins parents are having ongoing financial difficulties. Trustins mother is permanently disability due to a dying heart condition know as "IPAH".  As if things could not be any worse Trustins father is on workmans compensation due to a work injury and suffers from many conditions that are requiring treatment and surgeries. As one can imagine even before Trustin became so ill the parents have been struggling to support the family, and now its much more difficult. They have  a 7 year old at home which is about 60+ miles away from UCSF. They are trying to care for their 7 year old by keeping his daily life as normal as possible.  Trustins father is making the commute from home to SF on a daily basis with their 7 year old son. Gas, toll for the bridge, food, and medical expenses are all starting to accumulate and they desperately needing help! Please help by donating anything and sharing this page! We appreciate everyones generosity! 

What We Need 

  • Financial security 

Risks & Challenges

Trustin will undergo a life threatening surgery to remove the tumor that follows an intense 3-5 year recovery period. The tumor is about the size of a football and could be cancerous. Medical professionals are working as quickly and diligently as they possibly can to figure out what type of tumor, the cause, and the best plan of action for Trustin. Unfortunately, the tumor has also cause Trustin to suffer from hypoglycemia, which is an alarming concern that must also be adressed.

story:
Yoricap™ is a smartphone accessory and app that transforms your smartphone into a ECG, oximeter, glucometer and blood chemistry analyser and securely transmits the data to a healthcare provider of your choice. It will be available for BlackBerry 10 and soon to specific Android devices.

Yoritex offers innovative products that combine cutting-edge technology and convenience for patients and healthcare providers. Our evolutionary all-in-one device Yoricap™  has been developed to increase the convenience and effectiveness of remote patient management and monitoring.

This is more than just a wireless monitor for fitness. Only approved medical devices and secure communication protocols are used in the development of Yoricap™. Patient data will always be kept private while using Yoricap™.

The Yoricap™ approved by the US FDA and CE. So your contribution to this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign is very important for us and for millions of people with chronic illnesses.


Yoricap™ in the Media

"Turn Your BlackBerry Into Medikit With Yoricap – The Mobile Medical Aggregator".  - www.bbin.in

"Yoricap alles in één medische monitor". - www.bbwired.blogspot.com

"Yoricap verwandelt den BlackBerry in einen mobilen Gesundheitsmonitor". - www.blackberrybase.net

"Yoricap: All-in-one medical monitoring". - www.utbblogs.com

"Yoricap - All-in-one medical monitor for BB10". - www.forums.crackberry.com



Yoricap™ is a comprehensive mobile health Aggregator designed to connect your smartphone to multiple medical accessories and applications using your smartphone's micro USB connectivity to collect the medical information data aggregation to provide remote access and improved healthcare management.

Yoricap™,  your smartphone mobile health accessory provides measurements and secure collection of your blood pressure, pulse, oxygen levels, and blood tests (glucose levels, uric acid, total cholesterol), ECG, heart rate monitor with an option to transmit the health data to your healthcare providers.

Yoricap™ will grow with your health care needs. Our architecture allows you to increase the capacity and productivity Yoricap™ by adding more and more new sensors and devices when they come available.


A friendly and intuitive User Interface this is what you like in your smartphone.

Case just in case.

Easily fits in a small bag, the Yoricap™ case is convenient and always available.


In a burgundy case too...


Yoricap™'s advanced technology provides comprehensive monitoring solutions for professionals and home users. Our monitoring systems include multi-function meters and superior test strips. Currently, our users can check their total cholesterol, blood glucose and uric acid level with our monitoring systems.

If you have been diagnosed with diabetes, heart disease, stroke, or high blood pressure or if you are taking medication to control your cholesterol levels, you should monitor your cholesterol levels regardless of your age. An elevated total cholesterol level may alert you to a problem with your lipids and that you may be at increased risk of having heart disease.



With Yoricap™ chronic disease management is easier - as never before.

With Auto-Strip Recognition function, the system will recognize the inserted strip while testing.


High-End Design gives you a medical device that does not look like one.


Diagnosing, preventing and managing high blood pressure are essential in the battle to treat hypertension. Blood pressure monitoring is the first step.



With unique design features that simplify BP cuff positioning and significantly reduce the possibility of improper use, the Yoricap™ blood pressure cuff is a great choice for mobile monitoring and self-application environments.




Heart problems don’t happen on cue. They can occur anywhere, anytime and your doctor probably won’t be there. But they would like to see a record of the event – it can help them diagnose serious problems and monitor medication.

Your Yoricap™ ECG with integrated Pulse Oximeter shows blood oxygen measurements providing critical information regarding oxygenation, and ventilation.


Of course, our designers paid attention to the creation of an ergonomic, easy to use device to use with the smartphone.




An easy and intuitive user interface is an important part of Yoricap™ solution.

Yoricap™ is an accessory for the BlackBerry BB10 devices and in the near future selected Android smartphones. The security of your personal medical data is very important when it is collected and transmitted to your physician or health professional.

BBM is the World's Most Advanced mobile security connection.

BlackBerry Messenger and BES12 is the best solution for your specific needs and available for BlackBerry and Android phones devices. 


Try Yoricap™ and you'll have your medical testing anytime and anywhere.
With Yoricap™ and BlackBerry Messenger, your healthcare professional will always be behind you.

We're working hard to make your life better, safer and happier.

Learn more about Yoricap™


Yoritex management has extensive experience in design and implementation of complex multi-engineering, medical, software and marketing projects.

The Yoricap™ on a way to you!

Risks & Challenges

Before Yoricap™ can become a medical device it will have to go through the CE, FDA (Food and Drug Administration) and Health Canada premarket notification process and this is where your help comes in. 

We've set a goal of $100K which will allow us to begin serial manufacturing and make Yoricap™ widely available as soon as December  2015.

Questions or comments...

If you want to know about Yoricap™ or if you wish to get in touch with us, you can contact us at info@yoritex.com or at our Facebook page.

Thank you for your support!

and convenience for patients and healthcare providers. Our evolutionary

patient management and monitoring.

story:
I'm a regular college student that wanted a furry companion. And I was lucky enough to get two. But one of our kittens, Guava, has been diagnosed with liver shunts.

Go here for more information:

http://www.vet.cornell.edu/FHC/health_resources/PortosystemicShunt.cfm

Our Guava experienced most of the symptoms on the list and was diagnosed a week after we adopted him. In that week, I grew attached to this snuggly potato. He has so much personality and love that I do not want to see him pass from something completely curable due to funds. 

So if you could please contribute a small amount towards bringing my kitten back to health, it would be such an amazing gift.

- Katie

story:
Systemic Lupus Erythomatosus

Imagine having to live with a constant worry that at any time your heart will become infected, and there is nothing you can do about it. You wake up at 4 am every few weeks with your mouth swollen and throbbing, blistered and infected. You have no dental coverage so you do the only thing you can: go to Urgent care for antibiotics that only partially work and cause major digestive issues. The staff wonders if you're a meth addict due to the condition of your teeth. You've never even smoked a cigarette. They ask why you don't just get them fixed, and they tell you are in very real danger. This is my life.

Due to having Systemic Lupus, a chronic and not yet curable autoimmune disease, my teeth have all but disintegrated.  SLE causes saliva and tear glands to stop working, chronic vomiting, kidney and bladder issues, skin lesions, joint pain and detioration, and nerve/neurological failures. The disease has also damaged my heart valve, and we are trying to put surgery for that out as long as we can. However, because I have constant oral infections the risk of bacteria infecting my heart is very high and getting worse. I'm basically a ticking time bomb.

We are currently appealing the state health plan to intervene, but it's a long shot   and the wheels turn slow. I need total restoration...either implants, bridges, dentures. Without insurance this is nearly impossible to afford on minimum wage.

Outside of the heart danger, I'd really just like to smile again. It's been 20 years since I've been able to do that. Thank you for reading!
