story:
Media Coverage

Daily Herald: Orem resident starts Health Movement to promote healthy living

ABC4 News: Improving health around the world

Daily Universe: BYU grad Rich Millar starts company Health Movement

About Us

We’re on a mission to fight disease and help everyone reach his/her health goals!  Everyone has a reason to be healthy, but no matter our differing reasons, we are united in the same mission... to be healthier, feel and move better, and avoid disease. 

Now – you’re wondering how are we different from other health companies? 

This isn’t your “drink this bottle” quick fix health company or your “only eat sprouts and tofu” health company either.  This is your “let’s be realistic but also make it simple and enjoyable” kind of health company!  We’re all on this journey together no matter our preferences, challenges or current health status.  So we’ve created ONE company, brand, unified message, and vision for proper health: HEALTH MOVEMENT!  Our Manifesto says it all….

“No excuses.  It’s time to take control of our health.  Lasting energy doesn’t come from a bottle; it comes from healthy living.  Lifestyle is the best medicine.  Change the norm to healthy and get back to basics.  Sleep better.  Move more.  Eat the right amount and type of food.  Learn balance, healthy can still include your favorite dessert.  Don’t try to be someone you’re not, be the healthiest YOU.  Believe, then act!  Start small; build with time.  Ups and downs are normal.  Consistency really is king.  Healthy living is not a pit stop; it’s a way of life. Your preferences, challenges and goals; this is healthy living YOUR way.  Respect everyone for where they are.  We’re all in this journey together, just at different stages.  Everyone has a reason to be healthy, what’s yours?  Find it.  Get inspired.  Take action.  Share your story.  Inspire others.  Join the HEALTH MOVEMENT!”

5% Giveback

Because we’re dedicated to helping others reach their health goals 5% of all profits will go directly to our community program to help others LEARN, ACHIEVE, & INSPIRE proper health – not just during this fundraiser, but as a permanent part of our company philosophy.  Have a need in your community? Let us know (our email is below), and we’ll work with you to do the following:

  • LEARN: Hold free community workshops, worksite seminars, school assemblies or address a specific need in your community that helps others learn the principles of proper health.
  • ACHIEVE: Help fund community projects like building play grounds, finishing sidewalks, clearing walking trails, building community gardens or address a specific need in your community that helps others achieve their health goals.  
  • INSPIRE: Hold free community events such as yoga classes, boot camps, 5Ks or walking groups. We’ll pay for inspiring signs or billboards or address a specific need in your community that helps motivate healthy living.

Why We’re Raising Money?

We’re starting with a free website that will be our central hub, an online health community we can all benefit from to share and find upcoming health events, track our goals, get unbiased health information and motivate, inspire, and learn from each other. The money raised during this campaign will finish funding the website “Healthmovement.com” here’s a sneak peek of what it’s going to look like:

            

Rich, the founder of Health Movement, has used his own money to pay for (in order of cost): the domain name, graphic design, video production, programming, and other misc. items.   He has another $5,000 - $10,000 to invest but due to the complexity of the website more funds will be needed.  Buy a perk (to your right) and help spread the HEALTH MOVEMENT!

Perks

Check out some of our perks below.  For a complete list check out the side bar to the right.

Manifesto Poster (12" x 18")

 

T-Shirts & Tank Top (Next Level Shirts)

Flat Bill Trucker Hat

 

Zip Hoodie

 

How did Health Movement start?

Rich decided to quit his job in health care administration to start HEALTH MOVEMENT because he could no longer stomach trying to “fix” patients after they were already “broken.” Rich has a degree in nutrition and a master’s in public health and knew the research showed that by simply changing one’s LIFESTYLE we can eliminate 80% of all heart disease, stroke, and type 2 diabetes, and more than 40% of all cancer cases. How incredible is that?!  Something needed to be done! There must be a better way to help each other reach our health goals, avoid disease and live a healthy lifestyle.

Rich’s passion is health! And that’s the driving force behind this concept.  No “quick-fix” promises trying to sell a pill or drink that doesn’t really work but would make a ton of money.  Easy to do, and done every day – but we all know there are no “quick-fixes.”  Rich wants to do something different.  He has built a company around a central vision, creed, and manifesto that’s real, that’s honest, that truly works, that may not be what people want to hear but is the truth.  A company people can trust for honest information - free and helpful tools based on sound research - bringing people together behind a simple goal - HEALTH MOVEMENT was born.

Currently, the Health Movement team is made up of Rich, Kelly (a friend and grad school classmate of Rich’s) and a few college interns.

Who is this Movement for?

Everyone:

  • Into cross-fit or yoga, walking or biking, dancing or swimming, or still searching for what you like…this movement is for you!  
  • Fighting cancer, heart disease, diabetes, hypertension, stroke, or obesity…this movement is for you!
  • Tall, short, thick, thin, round or square…this movement is for you.
  • Vegetarian, gluten-intolerant, a meat-loving carnivore or love or hate chocolate…this movement is for you!
  • Trying to lose weight, train for a marathon or just have more energy…this movement is for you!

Because good health is one thing we all want and one thing we can all agree on regardless of our unique preferences - this is about healthy living—YOUR way - whatever YOUR way or reason is. We want to help you get there, but this is a problem too great for any one of us to try and solve alone.   We know there is strength in numbers, we have to work together, improve together, succeed, stumble and keep going together.  We are in this HEALTH MOVEMENT together!

Got Questions?

If you have any questions about Health Movement email Rich directly at: rich@healthmovement.com

Stay in Touch

If you’d like to stay in touch with us and receive email updates and know when we are ready to launch please subscribe to our email list here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1a581-mCv90FqyTEMbeaFFTaYCpydyfvm16qpURpOG1E/viewform

Give Feedback

We’d love to hear your feedback - after all, this is YOUR movement too!  What things would you like to see on the website and future app?  Have a need in your community we can help with?  Click on the link and let us know! https://qtrial.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_cOPXNJlyfn7oX2t

After Our 30 Day Campaign...

After our 30 day campaign we will promptly email each of our supporters who purchased apparel to clarify which t-shirt or tank, size, and cut (men's, women's, youth) they prefer for their package(s). There isn't a way to specify these details beforehand, unfortunately--but we will promptly get in touch with you before sending your order out!

Help Spread The Word/Movement

This movement starts with YOU! If you like what we’re trying to do please share our campaign with your friends and family online and be sure to tag us in your posts (our social media info is below)! Help spread the Health Movement!

FAQ

What sizes do you offer?

We offer the following sizes for our Men's, Women's, and Youth apparel: Small, Medium, Large, Extra Large, XXLarge, and XXXLarge (we use the Standard U.S. Apparel Size Chart).

If I pledge for a bulk order of items, what is the additional shipping and handling?

We are happy to accommodate orders of any size. Five (5) or fewer shirts do not require additional S+H. Six (6) to ten (10) shirts require $5 additional S+H. After that, it is just an additional $5 per increment of ten (10) additional shirts. If you would like to order 75 or more shirts, please contact us for our S+H pricing.   

How will Health Movement make money?

While the website and app (to come later) will be free to the general public, we have a corporate wellness division that works with companies to improve employee health for a monthly subscription fee. We’ll also continue to sell our awesome apparel…because let’s be honest, if you’re going to buy a workout shirt you may as well buy one that gives 5% back to helping others reach their health goals, right?! (see “5% giveback” section above for more details).

 

http://www.healthmovement.com

https://www.facebook.com/HealthMovement

http://instagram.com/HLTHMVMNT

https://twitter.com/HLTHMVMNT

https://www.youtube.com/HLTHMVMNT

http://www.linkedin.com/company/health-movement

https://plus.google.com/u/1/113813454807189000226

story:
Well Balanced Body

It's a fact, when people feel good, they do good. They are more productive at work. They smile more and are able to enjoy life to the fullest. That is a HUGE impact - not only to our community, but the world.

Hi, I am Dr. Malori Tinsley. I have an immense amount of passion to help people not only feel better, but function at their most optimal level.

My love for Chiropractic Applied Kinesiology (CAK) started about 20 years ago when I became a patient. I have reaped so many benefits from this type of care, that I want to share my knowledge and passion with others, like yourself!

I have seen firsthand, the impact that CAK along with nutrition and movement therapy has had on my patients lives. Even my very own Fathers life was and is forever changed.....more on that later.

Don't you want to make a difference in your life? Are you sick and tired of being sick and tired? Are you ready to make a change? Are you ready to really make an impact in your life? To not only feel good, but reach your most optimal potential.

Imagine that for a second. Imagine what it would be like if your body reached it's most optimal function. How would your life be different? You would sleep better, your family would be happier, your jeans would fit just right, and you would finally live your life to the fullest.

Your bucket list is finally getting checked off. Starting with optimal health. Because without health, you won't be able to enjoy all those amazing adventures on your bucket list.

 Make this year full of passion, full of vitality, full of health! Make this year, your best year YET. Don't just make another boring resolution, make an impact.

"Be the change you wish to see in the world" -Ghandi

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our wellness center is located in the Historic Opera House in Folsom California. It is 1000 square foot and ready to have you in it!

Our start up costs are 10k to get our facility up and running. Below is what YOU get out of it.

Services Offered

 

1. Chiropractic Applied Kinesiology: 

Applied Kinesiology uses manual muscle testing to asses the state of body's overall health. Applied Kinesiology Manual Muscle Testing (AK MMT) interprets brain function - since the brain controls everything - it is important to know how it is functioning. Furthermore, AK also determines the health of each organ system in your body. Muscles are connected  to every single system in the body - the respiratory system, digestive system, reproductive system, circulatory system, lymphatic system - every single system. Muscles are organs, and organs communicate with one another. Therefore, we can use muscle tests to find which system is in dysfunction that is causing you to feel pain or hinder function. For example, if you are experiencing low back pain, a regular chiropractor will locate the dysfunction in the low back as there is most often a misalignment in the vertebrae of the low back.  AK can uncover where the core problem lies, giving you a deeper diagnosis or explanation. Whether the problem lies in your digestive tract or lymphatic blockage - Using A.K. to find missing piece will allow your body to heal quicker and respond faster to treatment, because we will be able to treat the actual problem, not just the symptom.

 2.Functional Medicine:

Instead of waiting for a disease to manifest, Functional Medicine catches it early on and offers dietary and supplemental support to allow your body to function at its most optimum. At Well Balanced Body we are able to order you a full blood work panel at a more affordable price than it would cost you to order it through your regular Doctor. Plus unlike other practitioners, Dr. Tinsley takes the time to really analyze your findings, write you a detailed report, and offer you a specific plan to help you be well and stay well. When we really know and understand what is going on in our body, we are able to take action!
 

3. Movement Therapy: 

Movement therapy is the KEY to optimal function. When you first come into an appointment, you have all these movement restrictions. Based on old injuries - your brain creates compensational pathways in the brain. That means you literally move differently and restrict motion into those joints - the muscles tighten - and pretty soon "old age" is just an excuse to why you can't move the way you used to. Movement therapy helps rewire your brain into a more healthy movement pattern. Therefore your body can gain and maintain optimal function.

4. Yoga: 

Once you are able to move correctly, we offer yoga to keep you moving!  Yoga is one of Dr. Tinsleys passions, she prescribes it to her patients as a wonderful adjunct to her care. And Vice versa, a seasoned yogi can really benefit from Dr. Tinsley's care, because everyBODY deserves to reach optimal function. We encourage those to get their flow on - to experience how their body can move - and therefore can start doing activities that they love better!

5. Workshops:

We offer 1x/month workshops to help engage the community to get their healthiest. Our workshops are educational and are taught on different areas of health.  Without knowledge of health, we don't know how and why to get healthy. Here are Well Balanced Body, we believe that education is the catalyst for change.

 

****Based on these services, you can choose your favorite package below******

Choose from 4 different treatment packages

(Sign Up for packages to the right of this page)

Package 1: Body Treatments: includes detailed examination of your body with an emphasis on manual muscle testing and 6 Chiropractic Applied Kinesiology treatments valued at $960. You get it for only $767!

Package 2: GET Healthy! includes 1 extensive functional medicine blood work analysis, and specific diet protocol geared towards your needs, and 5 GET HEALTHY workshops (held here 1x/month). Valued at $600. You get it for only $487!

Package 3: Movement is LIFE: includes 1 movement therapy assessment (tests your range of motion in all joints and muscle strength) + 12 movement therapy sessions and 3 months of unlimited yoga. WOW! valued at $987. You get it for only $787!

Package 4: The Impact: Make a HUGE impact on your health, with this ultimate package. Includes all the benefits of package 1-3, plus more! -----> 6 visits for Chiropractic Applied Kinesiology, 1 Functional Medicine blood work analysis with specific diet plan recommendations for you, 12 Get Healthy Workshops, 12 movement therapy examination and and 12 movement therapy sessions, and ONE FULL YEAR unlimited yoga, and more! Total value $2,545. You get it for only $2017!

****Sign up for package 4 and receive a healthy gift bag with everything in it to help you succeed*****

 

Happy Customers

Since, moving her practice to the Sacramento area last year, Dr. Tinsley was nominated as one of the top Chiropractors! What an honor and a privilege to be able to serve this community and allow them to not only survive, but thrive!

Hear from the people who have reaped the benefits of these services.

"I visited Dr. Tinsley after trying many different practitioners for a collapsed arch with other related pain and flexibility issues.  The treatment she implemented with a lot of hands on manipulations relieved the pain which I had been enduring for over 7 years.  Follow up treatments with the regimen of daily exercises has been effective and lasting for over a year..  Surgery was not an option I wished to pursue although it had been recommended by others.  There were certainly a few other areas that Dr. Tinsley was very effective in correcting and relieving pain but most of all she worked at the entire body not just the original foot issue.   She was truly a unique in my experience in that there was follow up contact to see if the treatments were continuing to be effective.   I do not hesitate recommending her for Chiropractic care certainly a great choice.
-Rod A.

Dr. Tinsley provided chiropractic care that yielded immediate and long-lasting relief for shoulder, neck, and ankle discomfort.  She is knowledgeable and provided a level of care that will be difficult to replace.  Dr. Tinsley is conscientious and cares for her patients’ total well being. 
-Sharon M.

 "Dr. Malori Tinsley helped 3 of our family members with headache, neck, and other chiropractic issues. She addresses your diet and nutrition, and provides beneficial exercises to deal with whatever issue or pain that is causing trouble."
-The Medcalf family

My ears started hurting really bad in October/November of 2011. It was an almost constant intense pain that felt like something sharp and hot or cold was being stuck deep into my ear. I could not listen to music anymore, or play the piano, no more movies and certainly no parties or large groups of people. Cold air caused  more pain as well as any metallic sounds or the tinkling of glassware. I spent most of my time in my room in complete silence, often with a pillow over my head. The only thing that really helped was heat and silence. Even taking something like Advil or Aleve did not help much or for long. I did not know why this was happening, and all my doctors were saying that it was Trigeminal Neuralgia and that I would have to live with the pain for the rest of my life. This is not what a 20 year old wants to hear. Especially one who loves playing or listening music as much as I do. A friend of mine suggested that maybe a chiropractor could help, as something might be out in my neck that could be causing all of this. I went to a chiropractor a few times, but nothing really happened except the pain got worse. As the months went by I turned into a recluse, I never went anywhere, never did anything. The pain kept getting worse until I could not sleep at night because of it, even people talking to me made it hurt more. It started moving into my face, right along my cheekbones, and the right side was always the worst. I could not go outside in the cold without something covering my ears and face from the bridge of my nose down. Finally in August 2012, I saw Dr. Malori Tinsley. Dr. Tinsley knew within minutes what was wrong with me. Shortly before the pain started in the first place I had hit my head really hard. I did not remember this at first, but when I did I realized that it had hurt an awful lot but I had not had time to think much else about it when it happened. Dr. Tinsley told me that I had collapsed my sinuses and that this had caused blockage behind my ears, thus the pain. She told me a few things to do, gave me a new diet to try, and told me to come see here again. After that first visit I felt so much better. I was amazed at how much easier it was to do things without that constant pain in my ears. After a few months of visits every few weeks I was almost back to normal. I will forever be indebted to Dr. Tinsley, and I will never forget how she helped me. Thank you Dr. Tinsley, for everything.
-Larissa

I went to Dr. Tinsley for full body chiropractic work, everything just felt out of place and I was having strange pains that would come and go in my ankle, knee, lower back and neck and shoulders. Dr. Tinsley was able to find the exact location of my pain and the correlating muscle and muscular/skeletal imbalance that was causing it!

I found her so knowledgeable and incredibly caring, she really took A LOT of time to answer all of my questions. She was able to help me relax and release a lot of tightness and I felt so "straight" and aligned after the session, it was incredible.

She gave me 3 exercises to do that target my problem areas, my neck and jaw which are tight from stress and 60+hours a week at the desk, my shoulder blades which have become more and more rounded and my back and hips, which just needs help in general. I highly recommend her to anyone who is having "mysterious" pain/aches/cramps and just wants to feel good again!
-Anna T.

"I have never felt better; as I was treated for several months by Dr. Tinsley.I was treated for degenerative neck disease, a small fracture in my neck and arthritis. She has a lot of knowledge and really helped to keep me off the chemical drugs that mask the real problem. She used natural herbs and gave me lots of exercises to do which i still do. She has a special way of working with you as she expains why, what to do and about how the body functions. Lots of different techniques are used to deal with different problems."
-Dana

Dr. Tinsley's Testimonial

I am moved everyday by the positive health changes that occur in my patients lives. My passion to help people started at a very young age, when my Dad's live was forever changed....

When my Dad was about 40 years old, His heart would race uncontrollably, it became worrisome. He went from Doctor to Doctor trying to figure out the problem.  All his tests came back negative and they couldn’t figure out what was wrong with him. At the cardiologist office, the Doctor said, "there is nothing wrong with you, but we suggest putting a pacemaker in your heart to control the issue." This was very disheartening for our family. Our father had a perfect heart (according to the tests) and was in great shape. Wasn't there another answer? Luckily, my Aunt was attending Chiropractic College at the time and suggested that we get a second opinion by a Chiropractor Applied Kinesiologist in our area.

We took her advice and visited the Chiropractor. After careful examination, the Doctor found a chronic rib subluxation (rib out of place) in my Dad’s chest causing a lack of oxygen to his brain, therefore causing abnormal heart rhythm and speed, which is controlled by the brain. The Chiropractor told my Dad, "I know what is wrong with you and I can fix it."  What a relief!

And, he did just that. He corrected the problem by adjusting the rib back into it's normal position. Since that day, my Dad never had those heart symptoms again. His and our lives were forever changed.

From there on, Chiropractors have been my family’s go to for health questions, ailments, and just about anything. I remember my favorite day was our trip to the Chiropractor. Needless to say, they made me feel better and my body functioned better. They changed my diet. They listened to my concerns. They helped. They cared. And more importantly, they taught me about health.

Ready To Serve Our Community!

We are projected to officially open our doors in the beginning of Feburary with a soft opening Feb. 25th. With your help, you can make this Wellness Center - YOUR Wellness Center.

These are the current pictures of our place, we will be posting more updates as packages are purchased and lives are changed

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're totally strapped for cash, but still want to help, no worries!!  Sharing our mission on social media:  be it Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube, etc. helps us out as well! Any and all support is invaluable for our effort.

Thanks for reading! we look forward to seeing you at Well Balanced Body soon!

story:
The Evolution of Exercise

When you build a better body, you build a better life. And the best way to a better life, is by simplifying. Which is the core philosophy of Let’s Bands - eliminating excuses by evolving exercise. Let go of the gym workout that is a workout before it even begins, and instead put the power of the gym in the palm of your hand, or sleeve of your tote, or pocket of your purse - so it’s there, wherever “there” happens to be.

This is a complete workout that both burns fat and builds muscle, is scaleable so as you get stronger the resistance gets tougher,and is 24/7 connected to the most innovative workout programs on line.

The Evolution of Exercise is our Revolution of Resistance. 

WHO WE ARE?
Let’s Bands is a company founded by the creators of the powerband phenomena - Nina Romm, Valeria Trupia, Niko Schmitz, and Uno Gomes. Through a deep background in sports sciences, personal training, physical therapy, and design, we are leading the way in resistance training and resistance bands.

OUR GOAL
There’s an athlete in every one of us. But most never find that spirited person, as the grind of daily life, coupled with the onslaught of sugar-based nutrition, hide the athlete behind the excuses.

Let’s Bands, through a focus on simplicity and portability, strips away the excuses, and opens up the athlete in each of us. That is our goal. And through 100% dedication to our Let’s Bands products and workout system, we will succeed.

OUR MOST IMPORTANT INNOVATION - Simplification.
Excuses breed with complication. Let’s Bands takes away gym commute and parking hassles and lockers and towels and waiting for the right machine or bench nonsense, and replaces it with a simple and sexy resistance bands, coupled with a set of scientifically proven workouts at your fingertips. No matter where you go, no matter what you do, simplifying your workout is the best way to become the best you.

OUR MOST PROFITABEL INNOVATION - Smarter.
Everyone wants to improve, which is how every gym membership is sold. But the truth is, 67% of gym memberships are never used, and that truth is beginning to find mainstream awareness.

Instead, just as everyone wants a smarter way to get to their destination - hence GPS - everyone wants a smarter way to get to their new body and new life. And nothing is smarter than a workout you can use everyday, no matter where the day takes you.

OUR MOST MOTIVATING INNOVATION - Sex. Sex sells.
And in the women’s workout category, clothing companies are all too aware that the shoes and the shirt and the shorts and the socks better all work together when the customer is working out. Let’s Bands works in concert with that truth, providing not the boring black band of others, but visually stunning colors that speak to the “I wanna look good in everything” goal of our audience.

WHAT MAKES US BEST?
A one-of-a-kind combination: a highly versatile, portable, and scaleable training weapon designed to be as attractive as it is efficient - that’s coupled with a cutting-edge on-line training program.

Rather than working just one part of the body, the Let’s Bands workout works out the entire body, building core strength, burning off excess body fats, toning complete muscle set, improving fitness, and changing lives.

EACH AND EVERY WOMAN
Some women are made to be gym rats. But for most, the sweat-stained seats and wandering eyes are too much for even the most dedicated. The goal after all is to feel better about your body with each workout, rather than worse. Which is why the Let’s Bands team is creating the exclusive Lady’s Set.

Designed for the fashion-conscious and price-conscious, the Lady Set is also designed for the self-conscious, which is why all you need is a workout mat, and your internet connection. Let’s Bands does the rest, whether in the privacy of your own home, or at a hotel, or even on a lunch break in your office.

 For women of all ages, all fitness levels, and all walks of life, Let’s Bands Lady Set is the evolution of exercise.

WHATS IN THE BOX?
A brand new you. It all begins with the Lady Set bands, three resistance levels - light, medium, and tough, each its own gorgeous color - pink, light pink, and purple. Complete with a carry-all mesh bag that fits the bands, a mobile phone and car keys, the set also includes a motivational quick-start workout poster, a code for your 4 weeks training program and access to our on-line training programs.

Each training program is built around your busy life, never more than thirty minutes in length, and guaranteed to challenge you in a big way, burning and building and shaping. No matter your fitness level, a brand new you begins the second you open the box.

HOW TO MAKE IT ALL HAPPEN
Our goal is $20,000. Why 20K? We’ve already built our costly infrastructure and prototypes, as well as secured our supply chain, but we still need to create gorgeous packaging and amazing workouts for the powerset Lady . Every dollar you can put toward our goal is a dollar into the product coming to life and to the homes of women everywhere. At the moment, we as the Let’s Bands Executive Team, get not a penny. That is how confident we are of success. Success built by proven ability, with more than 80,000 single resistance bands in the original colors already sold.

With your help, the Lady Set will become the evolution of exercise for women across the globe. Perhaps your best friend, or your sister, or a stranger you’ll never meet but one who needs a fresh start to a new body and a new life - these are the women who will benefit from your generosity.

Get in early and get a life changing Lady Set before anyone else - and by the time we come to market, you too will be coming into your brand new body thanks to your own exclusive brand new Let’s Bands.

EXPERIENCE
Thankfully, we’re not new at this, as there is a lot to learn, and we learned it in the past year, selling thousands of resistance bands in multiple countries to both men and women. Through our experience, we’ve been able to streamline operations, focus ourselves on one highly motivated customer set - women, and create an offering as elegant as it is evolutionary.

CONFIDENCE
Any new product coming to market is a risk, but thankfully that risk has been minimized through both a highly experienced team, and a great track record in the category. The bands themselves have been tested extensively by every member of the team through every exercise possible, to assure their complete safety.

SHELF SPACE 
Let’s Bands has already become a household name throughout Europe, and is now expanding into the United States market and the UAE. While marketing will be focused on those three regions, the products themselves can easily reach anyone in the world who wants to evolve their workout.

powerbands are made with natural rubber latex, which may cause allergic reactions in some people. Seek medical attention at the first sign of allergic reaction. 

HOW CAN I HELP? 
Simple: Workout! It’s a great feeling to improve your body, and an even better feeling to improve someone else’s. So spread the word, and with it, help us reach our goal of coming to market and changing the world of working out. Post selfies, chat up walls, follow us on FB and Instagram, hashtag us #letsbands.

http://facebook.com/letsbands

http://instagram.com/letsbands

If you have any question or suggestions, we’d love to hear from you, so send us a text, even if it’s just to show off your brand new and beautiful body! @ info@letsbands.com

The Evolution of Exercise
story_txt:
The Evolution of ExerciseWhen you build a better body, you build a better life. And the best way to a better life, is by simplifying. Which is the core philosophy of Let’s Bands - eliminating excuses by evolving exercise. Let go of the gym workout that is a workout before it even begins, and instead put the power of the gym in the palm of your hand, or sleeve of your tote, or pocket of your purse - so it’s there, wherever “there” happens to be.This is a complete workout that both burns fat and builds muscle, is scaleable so as you
get stronger the resistance gets tougher,and is 24/7 connected to the most innovative workout
programs on line.


The Evolution of Exercise is our Revolution of Resistance. 
WHO WE ARE?Let’s Bands is a company founded by the creators of the powerband phenomena - Nina Romm,
Valeria Trupia, Niko Schmitz, and Uno Gomes. Through a deep background in sports sciences,
personal training, physical therapy, and design, we are leading the way in resistance training
and resistance bands.
OUR GOALThere’s an athlete in every one of us. But most never find that spirited person, as the grind of
daily life, coupled with the onslaught of sugar-based nutrition, hide the athlete behind the
excuses.
Let’s Bands, through a focus on simplicity and portability, strips away the excuses, and opens
up the athlete in each of us. That is our goal. And through 100% dedication to our Let’s Bands
products and workout system, we will succeed.



OUR MOST IMPORTANT INNOVATION - Simplification. Excuses breed with complication. Let’s Bands takes away gym commute and
parking hassles and lockers and towels and waiting for the right machine or bench nonsense,
and replaces it with a simple and sexy resistance bands, coupled with a set of scientifically
proven workouts at your fingertips. No matter where you go, no matter what you do, simplifying
your workout is the best way to become the best you.
OUR MOST PROFITABEL INNOVATION - Smarter. Everyone wants to improve, which is how every gym membership is sold. But the truth
is, 67% of gym memberships are never used, and that truth is beginning to find mainstream
awareness.
Instead, just as everyone wants a smarter way to get to their destination - hence GPS -
everyone wants a smarter way to get to their new body and new life. And nothing is smarter
than a workout you can use everyday, no matter where the day takes you.

OUR MOST MOTIVATING INNOVATION - Sex. Sex sells. And in the women’s workout category, clothing companies are all too aware that the shoes and the shirt and the shorts and the socks better all work together when the customer
is working out. Let’s Bands works in concert with that truth, providing not the boring black band
of others, but visually stunning colors that speak to the “I wanna look good in everything” goal of
our audience.






WHAT MAKES US BEST?A one-of-a-kind combination: a highly versatile, portable, and scaleable training weapon
designed to be as attractive as it is efficient - that’s coupled with a cutting-edge on-line training
program.
Rather than working just one part of the body, the Let’s Bands workout works out the entire
body, building core strength, burning off excess body fats, toning complete muscle set,
improving fitness, and changing lives.

EACH AND EVERY WOMANSome women are made to be gym rats. But for most, the sweat-stained seats and wandering
eyes are too much for even the most dedicated. The goal after all is to feel better about your
body with each workout, rather than worse. Which is why the Let’s Bands team is creating the
exclusive Lady’s Set.
Designed for the fashion-conscious and price-conscious, the Lady Set is also designed for the
self-conscious, which is why all you need is a workout mat, and your internet connection. Let’s Bands does the rest, whether in the privacy of your own home, or at a
hotel, or even on a lunch break in your office. 
 For women of all ages, all fitness levels, and all walks of life, Let’s Bands Lady Set is the
evolution of exercise.




WHATS IN THE BOX?A brand new you. It all begins with the Lady Set bands, three resistance levels - light,
medium, and tough, each its own gorgeous color - pink, light pink, and purple. Complete with a
carry-all mesh bag that fits the bands, a mobile phone and car keys, the set also includes a
motivational quick-start workout poster, a code for your 4 weeks training program and access to our
on-line training programs.
Each training program is built around your busy life, never more than thirty minutes in length,
and guaranteed to challenge you in a big way, burning and building and shaping. No matter your
fitness level, a brand new you begins the second you open the box.



HOW TO MAKE IT ALL HAPPENOur goal is $20,000. Why 20K? We’ve already built our costly infrastructure and prototypes, as
well as secured our supply chain, but we still need to create gorgeous packaging and amazing
workouts for the powerset Lady . Every dollar you can put toward our goal is a dollar into
the product coming to life and to the homes of women everywhere. At the moment, we as the
Let’s Bands Executive Team, get not a penny. That is how confident we are of success. Success built by proven ability, with more than 80,000 single resistance bands in the original colors
already sold.

Perhaps your best friend, or your sister, or a stranger you’ll never meet but one who needs a
fresh start to a new body and a new life - these are the women who will benefit from your
generosity.

Get in early and get a life changing Lady Set before anyone else - and by the time we come to
market, you too will be coming into your brand new body thanks to your own exclusive brand
new Let’s Bands.











EXPERIENCEThankfully, we’re not new at this, as there is a lot to learn, and we learned it in the past year, selling thousands of resistance bands in multiple countries to both men and women. Through our experience, we’ve been able to streamline operations, focus ourselves on one highly motivated customer set - women, and create an offering as elegant as it is evolutionary.

story:
Greeks and Greece Deserve to Compete Globally

Polychronis Tzortzakis is a National Greek Cycling Champion who races semi-professionally for a team in France. He is one of the many young Greeks who proudly wave the blue and white Greek flag, representing his nation wherever he races— despite being forced to live in France in order to pursuit his athletic goals.

Tzortzakis, a native of Hania on the island of Crete, hopes to race in Richmond Virginia at the Elite Road Cycling World Championship taking place on September 20-27, 2015.

He wants to represent Greece— and wear the blue and white Greek flag on his shirt.

But like all sporting institutions in the nation, the Greek Cycling Federation has huge budget shortfalls due to cuts in support and they don’t have the funds to send their National Champion to represent the country.

Polychronis reached out to me in a Facebook message— as have so many of Greece’s elite athletes, struggling to compete and represent their nation in these trying economic times.

“I don’t think I can win a medal but I will certainly race my best and hardest and gain a respectful result,” wrote the humble 26-year-old. “It’s important that the Greek flag is present on the race circuit at the World Championships. I really want to wear our flag and make our nation proud.”

Tzortzakis needs a paltry sum and wants to travel at bare minimum without the excesses enjoyed by other “National Champions”— another example of his humility. He needs about €2000 to €3000 for economy class flights to Washington DC, transport and hotel accommodations in Richmond, a minimal food budget and other related expenses including excess baggage costs for his bikes.

I have personally arranged this fund to help Polychronis and other elite Greek athletes get the recognition they deserve and compete on the global stage— whatever that stage might be, be it cycling, or in an arena, or on a track field.


On his Facebook page, he quotes the famous Cretan writer Nikos Kazantzakis and uses the hashtag #ProudToBeGreek for his profile picture.

"In order to succeed , we must first believe that we can." Nikos Kazantzakis


The Perks of this Campaign and the Impact?

True philanthropy is anonymous and should be altruistic at its core. This is why I haven't set up any "give this much and get this in return" kinds of perks. What you get-- and what I believe is the real satisfaction-- is the feeling that your money is helping a young, accomplished Greek achieve his goals, keep his/her athletic dreams alive, while simultaneously helping keep Greece and her flag on the international competition circuit.


Risks & Challenges

I will personally monitor and report on all athletes we support with this fund in The Pappas Post, as well as keep donors updated with regular updates on The Pappas Post Facebook page, as well as on my own personal Facebook page.

I will create a committee of sports-lovers to continue to seek out other similar opportunities to help Greek champion athletes who wish to compete in international competitions and with their consensus, will support them accordingly and also follow up with reports and progress. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not into donating funds, or believe your funds would be better-used assisting the poor, the hungry or other important philanthropic endeavors which are equally worthwhile-- you have every right to think that. But if you do believe Polychronis and other elite Greek athletes deserve to compete, you can help by sharing this campaign on your social media page, your blog or sending to athletically-minded friends and family.

story:
The P-Kit Story

It’s about filling a need. In fact, it’s about filling two needs. 

As I’ve traveled in different parts of the world doing medical work, I’ve seen incredible need. In some places, doctors don’t have the basic instruments they need to take care of their own patients. So patients go without care. 

I asked one of the ENT resident-doctors in Ethiopia if he had a car. He answered, “No, I don’t have money for a car. But if I did have money, I would not buy a car. I would buy surgical instruments.” He inspired me to find a way to help him buy them. And that solution is where the second need comes in. 

While learning how to take care of patients in other parts of the world, something I’ve always known became much more obvious. Women are more challenged than men are when it comes to bathrooms. It’s a fact. And whether I’m in a remote part of the world or hiking in Northern Minnesota, I need to have a bathroom I can use comfortably. I got tired of packing a bunch of separate, bulky items every day, always prepared for the worst. I came up with the P-Kit to meet my own, and every woman’s need to have a predictable bathroom as we travel to out-of-the-way places. And when you buy a P-Kit, you are helping to provide sustainable care to patients.
Learn more at P-Kit.org.
