story:
Plankpad - The Interactive Bodyweight Trainer

As seen on

PLANKPAD is an interactive bodyweight trainer that offers you more than planking. You connect your mobile device (cellphone or tablet) and enjoy amazing workouts and games. By playing a game, your focus is more into the game than on counting every second. It makes you plank much longer, reaching your goals faster while the time flies by having fun.

 

About the plank exercise

Benefits of Planking:

  • Prevent and get rid of back pain 
  • Get in shape 
  • Better posture 
  • Get a strong core 
  • Better motor coordination 
  • Strengthen muscles 
  • Builds abs 
  • Increases the body’s metabolism 
  • Makes you burn fat

Planking is proven to be one of the most effective workouts to build a strong core, align the spine and activate many important muscles of our bodies at the same time. 
Because the focus is on the core region, planking prevents and reduces lower back pain among many other injuries. You can conquer that desired six-pack and it also makes the amazing job of increasing the metabolism and burning calories while holding the plank position.

Activate many important muscles: 

  • Neck 
  • Arms 
  • Shoulders 
  • Chest 
  • Abdominals 
  • Back 
  • Glutes 
  • Legs 

 

Dr. med. Nils Lynen (Orthopedic Trauma Surgeon) shares his opinion about Plankpad

 

Dr. med. Nils Lynen, specialist for orthopaedics and trauma surgery from the Praxiszentrum Nordrhein in Aachen, shared his opinion about how back pain can be cured, relieved and prevented with plank exercises and how much he likes the idea of the Plankpad. He recommends the dynamic plank workouts using Plankpad 3 - 4 times a week.  

Right now he has one of our latest prototypes, to use it at the therapy of some of his patients.

Approximately 8 out of 10 people do suffer from back pain.

 

The Plankpad tested at the gym

 

After Plankpad was tested by around 100 people among family and friends, we took it to a famous gym in Cologne (Germany) to ask fitness experts and bodybuilders about their opinion.

We thought they would be very critical about playing games while exercising, but we were pretty surprised that even bodybuilders who are used to heavy and intense exercises also had much fun using the Plankpad with the smartphone app. They could also exceed their limits and challenge themselves while enjoying the game. In the end, everyone who has tried it out, wanted to own one for themselves.

Plankpad can be used as a Balance Board

The Plankpad can also be used as a Balance Board for:

  • Working your lower muscles out 
  • Increasing your body balance 
  • Motor coordination 
  • Reaction time 
  • Stability 
  • and to prevent injuries 

Therefore, we developed two games specifically for the use as a Balance Board

The app can be mirrored to surf or ski on your TV

Plankpad used as a balance board makes lots of fun on the big screen, when it is connected/mirrored via Apple TV, Chromecast, Samsung TV, etc.

And it is fun for kids as well! Children need lots of movement – and Plankpad helps them: simply click on the surfer or snowboarder game on the smartphone or tablet app, position yourself on the Plankpad and start surfing. That helps to develop the balance and strengthens the entire body.

 

Plankpad in detail

Plankpad itself is made of a fine long lasting and high-quality wood with a walnut finishing to make it look outstanding. The top is covered with a special foam where you can rest your arms to assure comfortable planking exercises. Plankpad comes with a special mat - so you don't slip, don’t make any noise and to protect your floor. We also added a nice handle to carry the Plankpad.

 

Plankpad App with different Games and Workouts

We created a perfect fitting app that synchronizes the Plankpad between your smartphone. You can install it on your iOS and Android smartphone or tablet. It comes with many different workout challenges and games. To start an exercise, you just need to download the app, place it on the straight aligned PlankPad to synchronize and choose a game or a workout. The app also teaches you to do the perfect plank.  

 

Different games keep you plank much longer

To play the game you have to balance the PlankPad left and right. The app and the gyroscope of your mobile device are in perfect sync with the Plankpad. There is a game for everyone like: Candy Monster, Circles, Asteroids, Wave Rider, and Snow Cruisin’. And in the future, there will be even more. The games will challenge you to last much longer, collect points, save your score and compete with your family or friends.

 

Multi-Planker Mode

We are working hard to bring more and more features to the Plankpad App. We thought what could be even more fun to plank against Friends and Family. That is why we want to bring the Multi-Planker Mode to Plankpad. So, in the future people can play games like Tennis against each other.

 

App with a special workout section

On the workout section, you find:

  • Many different plank positions 
  • Tutorials teaching you how to do them and 
  • Complete workouts divided in beginner, intermediate and advanced

You just need to follow the exercises and keep a correct posture. If you lose the position, the app will notice and comment on keeping a better balance.

 

Lidi talks about her experience using Plankpad for 4 weeks

Four weeks before we started recording the promo video, we asked Lidi to start using the different games and workouts on Plankpad. In this 4 weeks she did plank exercises for around 10 minutes every day with short pauses in between. Planking allied with healthy food habits showed amazing results. Every day she could hold the plank longer. In the end, she could hold the plank for 5 minutes without a pause. At the day of the recordings and the day of the photo shooting, she was planking like crazy. 

The results: She was thin already before the 4 weeks started, but her week core got very strong, her body transformed quite fast, she got six-pack abs.  

 

Reviews from people who used Plankpad

Tested with more that 100 friends and people at the gym

We tried Plankpad at more than 100 friends and also many people at the gym and we figured out that no matter the age and if you are well trained or not, the person could hold the plank position almost 50% longer than before.

 

Info

I have self-funded until the actual status of the project, that also includes the creation of all prototypes and the development of 80% of the app. The final prototype has been well tested by more than 100 people. Every dollar pledged will go towards finalizing the app, manufacturing, quality assurance, packaging and shipping.
story_txt:
Plankpad - The Interactive Bodyweight TrainerAs seen onPLANKPAD is an interactive bodyweight trainer that offers you more than planking. You connect your mobile device (cellphone or tablet) and enjoy amazing workouts and games. By playing a game, your focus is more into the game than on counting every second. It makes you plank much longer, reaching your goals faster while the time flies by having fun. About the plank exerciseBenefits of Planking:
Prevent and get rid of back pain 
Get in shape 
Better posture 
Get a strong core 
Better motor coordination 
Strengthen muscles 

Builds abs 
Increases the body’s metabolism 
Makes you burn fat
Planking is proven to be one of the most effective workouts to build a strong core, align the spine and activate many important muscles of our bodies at the same time. Because the focus is on the core region, planking prevents and reduces lower back pain among many other injuries. You can conquer that desired six-pack and it also makes the amazing job of increasing the metabolism and burning calories while holding the plank position.Activate many important muscles: 

Neck 
Arms 

Shoulders 
Chest 

Abdominals 
Back 

Glutes 
Legs 
 Dr. med. Nils Lynen (Orthopedic Trauma Surgeon) shares his opinion about Plankpad

 
Dr. med. Nils Lynen, specialist for orthopaedics and trauma surgery from the Praxiszentrum Nordrhein in Aachen, shared his opinion about how back pain can be cured, relieved and prevented with plank exercises and how much he likes the idea of the Plankpad. He recommends the dynamic plank workouts using Plankpad 3 - 4 times a week.  Right now he has one of our latest prototypes, to use it at the therapy of some of his patients.Approximately 8 out of 10 people do suffer from back pain. The Plankpad tested at the gym

 
After Plankpad was tested by around 100 people among family and friends, we took it to a famous gym in Cologne (Germany) to ask fitness experts and bodybuilders about their opinion.We thought they would be very critical about playing games while exercising, but we were pretty surprised that even bodybuilders who are used to heavy and intense exercises also had much fun using the Plankpad with the smartphone app. They could also exceed their limits and challenge themselves while enjoying the game. In the end, everyone who has tried it out, wanted to own one for themselves.Plankpad can be used as a Balance BoardThe Plankpad can also be used as a Balance Board for:
Working your lower muscles out 
Increasing your body balance 
Motor coordination 
Reaction time 

Stability 
and to prevent injuries 
Therefore, we developed two games specifically for the use as a Balance BoardThe app can be mirrored to surf or ski on your TVPlankpad used as a balance board makes lots of fun on the big screen, when it is connected/mirrored via Apple TV, Chromecast, Samsung TV, etc.And it is fun for kids as well! Children need lots of movement – and Plankpad helps them: simply click on the surfer or snowboarder game on the smartphone or tablet app, position yourself on the Plankpad and start surfing. That helps to develop the balance and strengthens the entire body. Plankpad in detailPlankpad itself is made of a fine long lasting and high-quality wood with a walnut finishing to make it look outstanding. The top is covered with a special foam where you can rest your arms to assure comfortable planking exercises. Plankpad comes with a special mat - so you don't slip, don’t make any noise and to protect your floor. We also added a nice handle to carry the Plankpad. Plankpad App with different Games and WorkoutsWe created a perfect fitting app that synchronizes the Plankpad between your smartphone. You can install it on your iOS and Android smartphone or tablet. It comes with many different workout challenges and games. To start an exercise, you just need to download the app, place it on the straight aligned PlankPad to synchronize and choose a game or a workout. The app also teaches you to do the perfect plank.   Different games keep you plank much longerTo play the game you have to balance the PlankPad left and right. The app and the gyroscope of your mobile device are in perfect sync with the Plankpad. There is a game for everyone like: Candy Monster, Circles, Asteroids, Wave Rider, and Snow Cruisin’. And in the future, there will be even more. The games will challenge you to last much longer, collect points, save your score and compete with your family or friends. Multi-Planker ModeWe are working hard to bring more and more features to the Plankpad App. We thought what could be even more fun to plank against Friends and Family. That is why we want to bring the Multi-Planker Mode to Plankpad. So, in the future people can play games like Tennis against each other. App with a special workout sectionOn the workout section, you find:
Many different plank positions 
Tutorials teaching you how to do them and 
Complete workouts divided in beginner, intermediate and advanced
You just need to follow the exercises and keep a correct posture. If you lose the position, the app will notice and comment on keeping a better balance. Lidi talks about her experience using Plankpad for 4 weeksFour weeks before we started recording the promo video, we asked Lidi to start using the different games and workouts on Plankpad. In this 4 weeks she did plank exercises for around 10 minutes every day with short pauses in between. Planking allied with healthy food habits showed amazing results. Every day she could hold the plank longer. In the end, she could hold the plank for 5 minutes without a pause. At the day of the recordings and the day of the photo shooting, she was planking like crazy. The results: She was thin already before the 4 weeks started, but her week core got very strong, her body transformed quite fast, she got six-pack abs.   Reviews from people who used PlankpadTested with more that 100 friends and people at the gymWe tried Plankpad at more than 100 friends and also many people at the gym and we figured out that no matter the age and if you are well trained or not, the person could hold the plank position almost 50% longer than before. InfoI have self-funded until the actual status of the project, that also includes the creation of all prototypes and the development of 80% of the app. The final prototype has been well tested by more than 100 people. Every dollar pledged will go towards finalizing the app, manufacturing, quality assurance, packaging and shipping.

story:
Chers futurs collaborateurs, bonjour.


Après avoir financé durant deux ans et six mois l'entreprise seuls, aujourd'hui nous disposons; d'un local, de machines et du matériel d'emballage.
Mais nous avons besoin d'un fond de roulement et d'une trésorerie afin de nous lancer , choses que toute banque ne finance pas.

 VALEA est une entreprise familiale constituée  d'un couple et d'une sœur. Nous avons investi deux ans de notre vie et nous sommes vraiment partis de zéro.

Nous comptons sur vous pour nous aider  et nous vous en remercions de tous cœur.

VALEA est une entreprise de distribution agro-alimentaire s'adressant dans un premier temps aux professionnels avec la vente de produits en grosse masse. Mais nous voulons aussi par la suite nous adresser aux particuliers en leur proposant un service de livraison de box (voir explication plus bas).
Pour toutes les personnes ne mangeant pas de viande, ou ayant des allergies tel que le gluten et autres, pour toutes les femmes en période post-natale qui souhaitent perde du poids ou avoir une aide énergétique. Pour tous les sportifs, et les personnes qui souhaitent avoir une meilleure hygiène de vie et qui n'ont pas les moyens d'une cure.

Nous vous remercions encore d'avance pour votre participation.

                             



Présentation :

Actuellement Valea est une entreprise de distribution basée sur tous types de marchandises agro-alimentaire susceptible de vous apporter une aide au bien-être. Nous avons créé  Valea avec toutes les meilleures denrées alimentaires que nous connaissons ayant des apports et des bienfaits nutritionnels.

Nous travaillons avec des producteurs qui ont le respect de le nature et de leur culture. C'est agriculteurs nous confient leur marchandise dans le but de trouver des clients au meilleur prix.


Pour les distributeurs et revendeurs :

Nous serons ouverts à vous et nous vous proposerons ces produits non transformés à la tonne et bientôt au kilo (pour la restauration spécialisée, pour les marchés ou tout simplement sur simple demande).

Pour les particuliers : Nous mettrons à votre disposition par internet ou par nos vendeuses à domicile. Nos graines, nos plantes et nos gélules (100% naturelles et analysées en France).

vente en palette conditionnée en sachets

  vente en gros sous sac de 25kg              



Nous restons avant tous distributeur en gros .



NOTRE PROJET DE DISTRIBUTION

Comme nous l'avons mentionné précédemment nous distribuons les produits de producteurs en gros. Nous profiterons de cet activité pour les mettre sous-forme de paquet pour les particuliers en vous les proposant au meilleur prix. Nous nous sommes ainsi diversifiés en transformant le produit brut en des produits plus facile à la consommation.


Pourquoi nous avons créé Valea ? :

Étant un budget souvent trop lourd, les solutions de bien-être naturels ne sont réservés qu’à l’élite ou demande trop d’efforts financiers. Mais la nature devrait être à portée de tous et c’est là notre vœu le plus cher.

Le plus important dans la vie est la santé et nous voulons vous offrir toute sorte de compléments alimentaires indispensables à un changement de qualité de vie. Mère nature est bien faite et peut vous aider à régler chacun de vos problèmes.


Pour les particuliers :


NOS PRODUITS

Vous aurez le choix :

  • acheter à l’unité (/100gr)

  • acheter une boite sans abonnement (prix préférentiel au/gr)

  • acheter une cure (prix préférentiel au/gr + réception de vos boxes chaque mois avec les produits que vous aurez sélectionné. La durée de l’abonnement : trimestriel. Ex : chaque 1er du mois vous recevrez votre sélection de chlorure de magnésium, levure de bière, baie de Godji et votre chia (selon votre choix).

Vous n’aurez qu’à choisir la boite que vous souhaitez. Et nous vous enverrons nos meilleurs produits. (Aloe verra, chia, gingembre, baie de Godji, levure de bière)


Nous savons que votre temps est précieux, c’est pour ça que nous vous proposerons tous ces produit naturels sous différentes formes.

  • gélules, pour le travail

  • crème : pour se détendre

  • poudre ou en graine : pour les salades ou les plats cuisinés.

Notre entreprise sera près de vous et s’adaptera à vos demandes. Nous souhaitons vous apporter le meilleur ainsi nous testerons tous nos produits par des laboratoires en France. Car notre but est votre bien-être.

exemple : pour la jeunesse de votre peau, l' antioxydant le plus efficace est le Curcumin. 

   

Et nous avons étudier toute les plantes et graines pour vous apporter tous les nutriments essentiels à votre équilibre et vos maux. Par exemple la graines de chia doit être conservée à 15 degrés car les graines perdent toutes leurs valeurs nutritionnelles si la température n'est pas respectée. Seulement, rares sont les personnes disposant d'un frigo réglé pour conserver ce genre de produits, 

Alors nous vous proposons la graines en poudre, gélules et huiles

         

(exemple de produits que nous allons distribuer)



DIETETIQUE BOX

Pour faciliter les cures nous avons créer la box, celle-ci reste toujours en développement et figure dans nos projets futurs. 

Pour vous aider dans vos régimes, pour accompagner les sportifs, ou pour vous aider quotidiennement à rester en pleine forme, les compléments alimentaires sont de grandes alliées à l’abonnement à la salle de sport. Ils vous aideront selon votre objectif et vos petits soucis à couper la faim, à réguler votre transit, éliminer vos problèmes de peaux, combattre les signes de stress ou de fatigues et pleins d’autres possibilités.

(en projet maquette)nous avons des photos avant/après que nous mettrons exclusivement sur notre site.


Où nous trouver ? :

  • VALEA disposera d'une équipe de 15 VDI qui seront disposés équipés et formés à la vente à domicile.
  • 1874 points de vente ont répondu favorablement à la vente de nos produits (magasins spécialisés, grossistes et revendeurs).
  • Marchés bien-êtres, foire expo.
  • Notre futur site internet.

Nous allons en tout créer sous les  deux ans 20 postes grâces à vos donations.


Que proposons-nous ?

Notre site internet et nos boxs seront adaptés à tous. Des explications claires et concises seront données pour chacun des produits. Il vous sera indiqué : les bienfaits, leurs compositions (oméga, vitamines, protéines et autres), les recommandations et les mises en gardes. Vous trouverez aussi sur le site officiel des recettes et des témoignages que nous mettrons à jour régulièrement.


Remerciements:

Ce projet nous tient à cœur car nous savons à quel point il est difficile d’accéder à ce genre de produit. Maman de deux enfant, je voulais retrouver la forme mais pas n’importe comment. Je voulais des produits naturels. Quand j’ai commencé à prendre les compléments alimentaires du commerce lambda et spécialisé, je me suis vite aperçue que la santé avait un prix.  Aujourd’hui’ hui, je veux proposer à chacun et chacune d’entre vous l’accès au bien être à un prix juste. Car nous avons tous le droit aux bonnes choses.

J’ai donc l’honneur de vous demander de participer à ce projet qui sera sans aucun doute une aventure que vous ne regretterez pas. 

merci a tous pour votre soutien. 

                                              

L'équipe


 Créatrice/conceptrice graphiste: Mlle Ouvrier. A.

 Négociateur anglais/espagnol, responsable de la mise en conditionnement : Mr Vales. D

Responsable clientèle et  responsable en communication  Mlle Ouvrier. M

après financement:

Responsable VDI BOXE RECRUTEUR VDI

Cyril



Nos partenaires financiers



Nous attendons vos donations pour vous rajouter

Nous redistribuons chaque année 8%  de nos bénéfices annuel

http://www.francealzheimer.org/

http://restosducoeur.org/

story:
Hi and welcome to our page!

Well I guess your intrigued as to what this is all about?

Simply, WowerShower is a new adult sex toy which is a shower head dildo. It works as a normal shower head, but also as a dildo when the mood takes you!

WowerShower was set up by a group of product designers who cannot help themselves in coming up with new ideas and now we need your help to take it to market!

WowerShower is a discreet and usable shower head (looks like an ergonomic shower head) that is on the brink of becoming the adult toy industry's newest and uniquest product in years, so help become a part of a great product, a great talking point and help show the world British design is best!


So, How Does It Work?

The idea is simple, you can use WowerShower like a normal shower head for everyday use...in fact....it works brilliantly and the handle allows you hold and direct the water all over your body due to its unique ergonomic design. Then, when the time is right and you are feeling the mood, simply turn the shower head upside down, twist the nozzle cap to reveal dedicated jets and.....well.....I am sure you can guess the rest!

By using the dedicated spray jets that have been designed to cut the water flow off from the main nozzles and direct them at the perfect angle, along with the use of the ribbed handle, WowerShower keeps bath time interesting for singles and couples!

This is the worlds first shower head dildo and we are very proud to have come up with a product that not only has an awesome novelty factor, but also genuinely, one of those light bulb moments.

In recent years, one of the few industries to do well, has been the adult sex toy industry, in fact, it has grown significantly. We looked into this market and thought of what new toys we could bring to the table. We new that some women like to use the spray from a shower head to stimulate themselves, so we thought there must be a product with a dildo, but to our surprise, there wasn't.

So, long story short is the WowerShower was born and then we got cracking. As mentioned, we are designers and engineers by trade so we quickly got the design moving forward, further iterations and concepts down the line, we produced our first prototype. We then took this to the Erotica Sex Show in London to show trade and industry people. The feedback was excellent! We didn't think that it would have been that positive, so from that, we then moved forward and started to work on the manufacture side, packaging and flow rate calculations to ensure that the product will work. We made a small batch of working prototypes and then contacted the retailers. Immediately, we had 3 of the largest retailers in the UK want us to come in for meetings to discuss buying. All were interested.

So now, we just need the investment to help get production going.


What We have Done So Far!

First of all, we worked on the design of the product and filed for intellectual property protection world wide and also have Design Rights granted throughout worldwide territories including UK, Europe and USA.

We then worked on a Rapid Prototype so that we could have a physical representation of our idea to discuss and show so that it could aid us with the next phase of design.

With this rapid prototype, we took it to the London Erotica Show in Earls Court. This was a good opportunity to show it to industry professionals that were all under one roof at the same time. The feedback was beyond positive. We spoke to all the main retailers, both online and high street and they all expressed interest in seeing the final product. The main response was that it was a simple idea, marrying up the use of the handle as a dildo along with the stimulation from the jets.

Another positive was that we saw so many products that you would think would never sell, but the adult market is huge and people are always looking for the next big idea.

With this positive feedback, we then moved onto the next stage of design which was to produce a batch of working prototypes. We had an aluminum tool made so we could make these and with some hard work, we produced a batch of 10 that had metal threads, fully working water nozzles and revealable stimulator jet!


We wanted to now test these prototypes and we had no shortage of testers! We gave them out and a week or so later, we got the feedback. It wasn't what we expected......it was much better! All the testers gave positive reviews including, "the ribs on the handle add even more sensation", "the clit jet is genius!" and it all worked within 2 minutes...!".

This was excellent news for us as we had a product that was reviewing and testing well with our target audience and our retailers.

We were then contacted by the UK's largest high street retailer and also the UK's largest online retailer who both wanted us to come in for a meeting to show them WowerShower, to which we obliged! They loved the product and expressed interest to stock it.

With this news and what we have learned so far, we are now confident to go into production, so we are looking for investment to help get us there.

The money will go towards:

  • Producing the tooling for the components
  • Packaging
  • Transport
  • Sales/Marketing
  • Admin
  • Rent&Rates

With a team of designers, engineers and accountants behind this company, we are in excellent hands. The team have years of experience in design, manufacture and business to make sure this project succeeds and with the investment we seek, we can make this happen!


Thanks for reading,

The WowerShower team!

www.wowershower.com



FAQ's:

How do I install it?

Installing WowerShower is easy. It has been designed to simply attach on to most existing shower head brackets. You unscrew your existing shower head and attach the same hose to the back of WowerShower and that's it!

Do I have to take it down in-between using it?

That's totally up to you. It was designed with discretion in mind, so looks like any other ordinary shower head, just with a built-in ergonomic handle. So to the untrained eye its intended use is far from obvious.

The G-spot stimulation bumps on the dildo were specifically placed to fit between your fingers perfectly when in use as a handle during shower time. These features together with the curved handle really do make for something that just feels 'right' in your hand, providing a more pleasurable shower experience.

Is this safe in terms of hygiene?

Yes, WowerShower is made from a polymer blend containing special antibacterial additives. Common sense would suggest you clean it using an antibacterial soap or an approved sex toy cleaner on a regular basis, but due to the way WowerShower works & the environment it operates in, the product is pretty much self cleaning. If you prefer, you could always apply a condom to the handle for extra peace of mind.

 the brink of becoming the adult toy industry's newest and uniquest 
product in years, so help become a part of a great product, a great 
talking point and help show the world British design is best!So, How Does It Work?The idea is simple, you can use WowerShower like a normal shower head for everyday use...in fact....it works brilliantly and the handle allows you hold and direct the water all over your body due to its unique ergonomic design. Then, when the time is right and you are feeling the mood, simply turn the shower head upside down, twist the nozzle cap to reveal dedicated jets and.....well.....I am sure you can guess the rest!By using the dedicated spray jets that have been designed to cut the water flow off from the main nozzles and direct them at the perfect angle, along with the use of the ribbed handle, WowerShower keeps bath time interesting for singles and couples!This is the worlds first shower head dildo and we are very proud to have come up with a product that not only has an awesome novelty factor, but also genuinely, one of those light bulb moments.In recent years, one of the few industries to do well, has been the adult sex toy industry, in fact, it has grown significantly. We looked into this market and thought of what new toys we could bring to the table. We new that some women like to use the spray from a shower head to stimulate themselves, so we thought there must be a product with a dildo, but to our surprise, there wasn't.So, long story short is the WowerShower was born and then we got cracking. As mentioned, we are designers and engineers by trade so we quickly got the design moving forward, further iterations and concepts down the line, we produced our first prototype. We then took this to the Erotica Sex Show in London to show trade and industry people. The feedback was excellent! We didn't think that it would have been that positive, so from that, we then moved forward and started to work on the manufacture side, packaging and flow rate calculations to ensure that the product will work. We made a small batch of working prototypes and then contacted the retailers. Immediately, we had 3 of the largest retailers in the UK want us to come in for meetings to discuss buying. All were interested.So now, we just need the investment to help get production going.What We have Done So Far!First of all, we worked on the design of the product and filed for intellectual property protection world wide and also have Design Rights granted throughout worldwide territories including UK, Europe and USA. We then worked on a Rapid Prototype so that we could have a physical representation of our idea to discuss and show so that it could aid us with the next phase of design.With this rapid prototype, we took it to the London Erotica Show in Earls Court. This was a good opportunity to show it to industry professionals that were all under one roof at the same time. The feedback was beyond positive. We spoke to all the main retailers, both online and high street and they all expressed interest in seeing the final product. The main response was that it was a simple idea, marrying up the use of the handle as a dildo along with the stimulation from the jets.Another positive was that we saw so many products that you would think would never sell, but the adult market is huge and people are always looking for the next big idea.With this positive feedback, we then moved onto the next stage of design which was to produce a batch of working prototypes. We had an aluminum tool made so we could make these and with some hard work, we produced a batch of 10 that had metal threads, fully working water nozzles and revealable stimulator jet!We wanted to now test these prototypes and we had no shortage of testers! We gave them out and a week or so later, we got the feedback. It wasn't what we expected......it was much better! All the testers gave positive reviews including, "the ribs on the handle add even more sensation", "the clit jet is genius!" and it all worked within 2 minutes...!".This was excellent news for us as we had a product that was reviewing and testing well with our target audience and our retailers.We were then contacted by the UK's largest high street retailer and also
 the UK's largest online retailer who both wanted us to come in for a 
meeting to show them WowerShower, to which we obliged! They loved the 
product and expressed interest to stock it.With this news and what we have learned so far, we are now confident to go into production, so we are looking for investment to help get us there.The money will go towards:
Producing the tooling for the components
Packaging
Transport
Sales/Marketing
Admin
Rent&Rates

With a team of designers, engineers and accountants behind this company, we are in excellent hands. The team have years of experience in design, manufacture and business to make sure this project succeeds and with the investment we seek, we can make this happen!Thanks for reading,The WowerShower team!www.wowershower.comFAQ's:

to simply attach on to most existing shower head brackets. You unscrew 
your existing shower head and attach the same hose to the back of 
WowerShower and that's it!

That's totally up to you. It was designed with 
discretion in mind, so looks like any other ordinary shower head, just

use is far from obvious.

story:
We, together with God, family, friends and people we haven't met, are going to raise $13,000 for a family in need. God has shown us things this week that tell us this money WILL BE raised, but we need your help.

My brother and his wife are the amazing parents of three wonderful boys. Their oldest two boys are autistic. The younger of the two is more severely affected by it. He is thirteen years old and does not talk (among other issues). Being unable to communicate is frustrating for him, which was leading to meltdowns of epic proportions. To keep him from hurting himself, my brother and SIL would have to throw themselves in the line of fire. Often, my SIL was alone and would end up battered and bruised while trying to keep her baby from hurting himself. It got to the point where she had to lock herself in the bathroom more than once and dial 9-1-1. There is only one live-in facility in the state of Oklahoma that is qualified to take care of someone with issues like my nephew's, but in order to get the facility to take him in, my brother and SIL have to share parental rights with the state. They are working with autism support advocates and attorneys within the court system to fight for the care of their son. It was that or keep him at home and wait for the day when he'd put his mother and/or himself in the hospital.

My nephew has been in this facility since August. My brother, his wife and their other two boys have been slowly recovering from the severely stressed environment in which they were all living. The facility wants them to come to therapy sessions once a week. The only problem, besides having to take time off work every week and figure out care for their other two boys, is that they do not have transportation to make the four hour round trip every week. At this point, they're lucky their car gets them to work. They probably still have nightmares about a particular trip back to the facility that ended with them broke down (different car) on the side of the highway on a 100 degree day with my nephew in the car. Eventually, they were joined by ten state troopers, two ambulances, a fire truck and at least one news crew (who probably peed themselves once my fiercely protective, mama bear SIL was done with them).

The facility has been threatening to kick my nephew out if my brother and SIL don't start coming to therapy sessions every week. The powers that be at the facility don't particularly care that the parents have no way of getting there, nor do the parents have the financial means for the gas/food/child care/loss of work that would entail. It's not safe for my nephew or his family for him to live at home. If they can't make it to therapy sessions, the only way to make sure their son gets the care he needs and deserves would be to relinquish all of their parental rights. That's just wrong! Through the wonderful and mysterious ways of our powerful God, a reliable vehicle is being made available to my brother's family at a substantial discount. The dealership providing the vehicle can only hold it for 60 days.  Now we just have to pay for it.  We WILL pay for it. I can't even describe to you how much I know this deep down in my soul, but we can't do it alone. We need help. God has shown us that that's the way this is going to happen. They're good, Christian people who want to protect their boy. God is telling us there are people out there who can help them do this! If you work for a business that can help, please talk to them.  If your church can help with a donation or a love offering, every cent would be appreciated. If God has blessed you with an abundance, and you feel moved to pay it forward, please consider helping this family.

If money is raised beyond the $13,000.00 goal, those funds will be used for travel expenses and child care on the days of the therapy sessions, for supplemental help with legal expenses, and for the purchase of a refrigerator, since the family's fridge has now broken down for the sixth time.

Thank you for taking the time to read this! God bless all of you!

story:
Summary

I struggled for years with infertility.  After 5 years, I finally had a daughter and I knew I wanted to do something to help others that struggled like I did.  I created My Hopeful Journey with my personal funds and prize money from 2 business plan competitions.  I have an MBA and a personal connection to the infertility community.  I also have collaboration partners in this community that ROCK!  Some are highlighted in the e-nfertility gift basket!!!

Now, I would like to create an iPhone app that brings together resources, events, information, a fertility organizer and more in 1 app.  This will be a one stop app to help SIMPLIFY infertility diagnosis and treatment for the patient. This concept brings the best use of technology to the end user with a strong focus on collaboration!

What We Need & What You Get

Most of the development work has been done already.  The My Hopeful Journey fertility organizer has been live for over year.  We have already started the app development but need funding to finish the development for some of the key areas such as the resources directory, products and events pages.  We would also like to make some much needed enhancements to our website too.

I am 100% commited to this project and every dollar contributed will go DIRECTLY towards the development of this app. and the prizes that support it.

The Impact

This campaign serves multiple purposes.  Of course, it promotes this app and funding for this project.  It also opens the door to speak about infertility and breaks down the stigma and silence associated with it. 

Infertility changed me as a person forever.  I would like to take the most difficult time in my life and use that experience to help others.   I want to make this process as easy as possible for other intended parents.. this is a way that I can contribute to the community in a meaningful way. I feel so blessed to be a mother and I want to give others hope too!

I have already developed My Hopeful Journey with my personal funds.  I have won the support of the business community and have received many success stories from women that have used My Hopeful Journey during their treatment.  I am committed to the success of the Infertility Survivial Kit and to this community.  Help me to make this a success. 

I am open to your feedback and welcome your ideas & collaboration.

Spread the Hope & Hugs

SHARE US with your clinics - doctors and nurses

BLOG IT

LIKE US on Facebook

RETWEET US on Twitter

EMAIL US to your family & friends

story:
Hi I am Nancy Redburn,

I have been a volunteer Paramedic for many years. Unfortunatey, there is no disablity or retirement for those of us who run, light and sirens blazing to your emergency as a volunteer. I loved helping and was a hand holding paramedic. The doctors always asked why my patients, no matter how injured, came into the ER smiling. I explain that is was my job to treat them with the best medicine and the best attitude (and worst jokes).

Unfortunately, I have now been diagnosed with stage 4 cancer, adenocarcinoma. The bills are mounting up and we can not keep up. My husband is an airline mechanic makes about $50,000 / yr. so there is nothing saved and we may lose our home. My chance of survival is 6% but I am fighting it, as best I can. They say it is slow cancer and that I may last as much as 6 months, but by then we will have lost our home.

Any help even a dollar or two, will be appreciated.

Please thank a Paramedic or a firefighter when you see them. We try to help at your darkest hours.

story:
Short Summary

We are a team of 5 young hard workers that wanted to have an extra project in their life. MMA is one of our common ground; we all are passionated by this sport.

When we analyzed the needs in Belgium, we realized a lot of competitors and fans were waiting for shows to be well-organized and that's what drive us all. We are ready to spend our time and energy to provide a great promotion that will help the athletes being seen by our local fans !

 

What We Need & What You Get

Via this crowdfunding, we want everyone to get something. For our first event (Genesis, which will be held in Mont-Saint-Guibert on the 29th of October), we will offer different things to all fighters:

  • Medals to all participants
  • A Novice+ tournament will be held, the winner will get a trophy
  • Our amateur main event will be for a huge cup of 120 cm !
  • Our main event will be a professional title fight, winner gets a belt.
  • All Pro fighters that end their fight with a finish will get a financial bonus for the show.
  • The fighters involved in the best fight of the night also get a bonus.

Since all these gifts will be given to the athletes to thank them for the shows they offer the fans, we would like to give an opportunity to the fans to thank them back, by being a part of this project, in helping us buying these gifts.

We get something: a financial help. And we thank the fans by assuring a great show. We thank the athlete by giving gifts.

Fans get something: A great show. And they thank athletes by financing the gifts. And they thank us by helping us financially.

Athletes get something: Great gifts for their performance. And they thank fans and us by giving their best.

Everybody win. Nobody lose.

The Impact

We have already shown how serious we are and how important it is to feel that everyone is involved in this project, having the same vision. We want everyone to go in the same direction, and we look to make everyone happy.

Risks & Challenges

There exist a lot of risk but we measured and will control all of them. We will face financial challenges as there are a lot to think about; rent the place, the MMA ring, pay the fighters, the audio-visual materials, etc. We are looking for sponsors everyday and we feel confident we will find the budget we need. If not, we are ready to put our own money on the line because we truly believe in the success of this project.

Also, some athletes might get injured leading to the event. But we have a big athletes database that would insure late-replacement if needed and we will be able to make sure the show goes on for the fans !

Other Ways You Can Help

We are looking for partnerships and sponsors of all kinds. If you are interested, feel free to contact any of us, we will be happy to discuss it with you: chris/max/ally/linda/jerem@360-mma.com

The more visible we are, the more our athletes will be visible. Share our Facebook page and invite your connections to follow our beautiful project: https://www.facebook.com/360MMA/

story:
Greetings everyone!

My name is Junneen, I live in California and I have a friend Melanie Hood that lives across the united states in Valrico, Florida (we met in a clickinmoms.com photography class online).

A group of us, who took the class, all stay in contact via a closed facebook group, we mainly share information about photography. Recently...Melanie shared that she has no running water in her house...and it has been THREE weeks!

She just found out that her well is not repairable(huge crack) and she needs $6500 dollars for a new well! She and her family do not have the money for a new well, they live on a fixed income and her son and husband are on disability. They have been showering at the in laws, we all know how that would be :).  I think most of us would be painfully inconvenienced if we did not have water for even 1 day(especially with kids)!

The $6500 dollars would help them get a new well and dig a deeper well so the water quality is better. Her water is currently a lovely tint of orange and their white clothes turn orange when washing....ew! The well is currently at 150 feet (not the correct depth for a well, hence the bad water quality).  

She did not ask for me to do this...I simply thought I'd put it out there to see if people would be kind and help her! I'm sure she would love any amount of donation to get her and her family running water ASAP! All the money (less indigogo's fee) will go directly into her paypal account. 

Let's all help her get water!

story:
**UPDATE:

We were just informed that Lisa's CANCER HAS METASTASIZED and spread to her adrenal gland and lungs. It is difficult to know how much longer Lisa has to live. The doctors have given her a range of three to nine months, but no one really knows. So time is of the essence as is the need for everyone's generosity. This is what has led up to this campaign.


Background:
Lisa Wheeler was diagnosed May 24, 2011 with Stage One Small Cell Lung Cancer.

May 25, 2011, she was admitted to the hospital for:

  • I.V. chemotherapy
  • bone scan
  • CT scans
  • brain scan


Just in the last 9 months, she has undergone:

  • 25 brain radiation treatments
  • 36 chest radiation treatments
  • 6-week long each chemo treatments



Lisa is currently w/out housing and has $300,000 dollars in hospital/doctor bills from her hospital stay. Her Medicaid wasn't effective until after she acquired this debt, thus making her responsible for all $300,000+ of these expenses. Unfortunately, she doesn't qualify for disability benefits because she has been self-employed for the last 7 years. Additionally there will be other expenses her family will have to absorb over the next three to nine months and thereafter.

-->>This is where you come in<<--

We can help lessen the burden on Lisa and her family just by giving a donation to this campaign.  Also, as mentioned before, she needs approprioate housing.  Any amount is greatly appreciated and every bit of help will go directly to Lisa & her family. The goal may seem low but that is to be assured that fees are lessened, leaving every dime to Lisa, so please give generously.

After your contributions, PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD about this campaign. Whether thru your own social network or by word of mouth. Get out there and push for this woman. We want to help her as much as possible.

Thank you soooo much for your kindness!

Lisa is currently w/out housing and has $300,000 dollars in hospital/doctor bills from her hospital stay. Her Medicaid wasn't effective until after she acquired this debt, thus making her responsible for all $300,000+ of these expenses. Unfortunately, she doesn't qualify for disability benefits because she has been self-employed for the last 7 years. Additionally there will be other expenses her family will have to absorb over the next three to nine months and thereafter. -->>This is where you come in<<-- We can help lessen the burden on Lisa and her family just by giving a donation to this campaign.  Also, as mentioned before, she needs approprioate housing.  Any amount is greatly appreciated and every bit of help will go directly to Lisa & her family. The goal may seem low but that is to be assured that fees are lessened, leaving every dime to Lisa, so please give generously. After your contributions, PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD about this campaign. Whether thru your own social network or by word of mouth. Get out there and push for this woman. We want to help her as much as possible. Thank you soooo much for your kindness!

Shipping Policy

All our pledges will be shipped with the United States Postal Service. You may change your shipping address if your pledge has not been shipped by contacting support@viori.com. Once items are shipped, you will receive a notification that it has been shipped and cannot change the address

For US orders, rewards will arrive within 3-5 business days and for international customers, it will take between 10-14 days. If we attempted delivery and you do not receive it because you’re not there, provided the wrong address, moved without providing us the updated address and the package gets returned back to us, we can resend you the order after the reshipping fee is paid. Our team can send you the invoice for it.

If you have any problems with receiving your shipment, missing/damaged items,  please contact support@viori.com as soon as possible. Once all pledges are shipped and received, you have 2 weeks to notify us of any issues that needs to be resolved. We are not responsible for LOST/STOLEN packages after tracking information from USPS says "delivered". No refund will be issued or order reshipped if  USPS has updated your package status as "delivered".

Refund Policy

We have a 100% pledge back guarantee = you have 7 days after the end of the campaign to receive a full refund for the rewards you pledged for on Kickstarter. After the 7 days, we will start placing orders for materials for production and will NOT issue any refunds.

Exchange and Return Policy

There are no returns for crowdfunding products. However, if you received the wrong pledge, please contact support@viori.com and we will be more than happy to assist you.

Customs and Duties

For those backers who reside outside the US, we are not allowed to mark these pledges as gifts when being shipped. We are unable to cover any VAT, GST, duties and taxes that may be imposed on the product from your country of residence. There will be not duties and taxes for US customers as we manufacture and ship our products from the United States.

Pledge Surveys

Once surveys are sent out to our backers, please fill them out as soon as you can so we can ship out rewards to you on time without any delays. These surveys are important as it tells us what you are ordering and where we need to ship them to. You will have more than enough time to fill out the pledge survey. However, once all pledges are shipped out and your survey is still not answered. You will have 180? days to complete your survey or you will forfeit your pledge.

Storage

To ensure the soap last as long as possible, be sure to place the soap in a holder that drains. Placing the shampoo or conditioner bar in a holder where water can build up can decrease the number of uses of the bar. Avoid dropping the bar into a bath as well.

Disclaimers

All our products are made from natural ingredients. If any of our products cause any itchiness or rashes, please discontinue use immediately and consult with a doctor if necessary.

Please note, our products are handmade so there might be a slight difference in color or consistency with different batches. The quality of your products will not be affected. 

Goods & Services

In addition to our shampoo and conditioner bars, we intend to expand our VIORI brand to include skincare, hair care, and face care products, cosmetics, and other types of all-natural soap bars.

story:
Hello, everyone, my name is Mark, I work as a sandwich artist at a local Subway restaurant, and on the side my passion is to be a musician, I'm a singer/song writer. Unfortunately I'm just starting out on the music front so it's not very profitable, and most of my monthly income is devoted to bills and food. Can't even afford a car at the moment. But today I'm here to ask for your help,  I  am in need of extensive dental surgery, totaling $3480 Canadian currency. 

I realize this is a strange matter to come to the internet for, but that amount of cash is simply out of reach for me, I can't afford dental insurance, and my job doesn't offer benefits. So all expenses are out of pocket for me. I've tried many options such as local  universities that train dentists and offer reduced prices but of the 3 local college/universities in my area that  provide these services all three said the waiting list is 3 years long, and that they cannot provide for the amount of work I need done. I've even tried government assistance via the ontario works drug card program and I was denied twice for that. As well as a dental credit card, which I was also denied. So I'm left with nothing but  saving as much cash as I can. I've sold some old guitar gear I wasn't using, cut back on expenses as much as possible but  I haven't been able to muster up much cash. So I'm turning to you for help.

I'm asking if anyone could find it in their heart to donate a little to help me out. Anything at all and I'd be  grateful, 50 cents, a dollar, 5 bucks, I'd be eternally grateful for anything to help out with this. Unfortunately I can't afford to offer any perks for your kindness other than my eternal gratitude. I wish I could, sincerely.
 
All I'm asking is for the expenses for the Surgery, travel expenses and  a little bit to cover the indiegogo fee's.

If you are unable to donate to help me out, you'd be doing me a huge favor by sharing the campaign and I would still be grateful!

Too make the surgery easier to pay for, my dentist and I have broken it all down in to a series of 6 visits.

1st   - 3 tooth restorations - $624
2nd - 3 tooth restorations - $641
3rd  - 4 root planning operations($220 a piece) - $880
4th  - 2 tooth restorations - $537
5th  - 2 tooth restorations - $399
6th  - 2 tooth restorations - $399
--------------------------------------------------------
All together that's a total of $3480

Anything made beyond that price will go strictly towards travel expenses, and if anything is left over afterwords I will use that money to put in as donations to other  indiegogo campaigns.

If I could raise enough to take care of even just one of those operations It'd be amazing! And to prove I'm not scamming anyone here, I've taken my last $25 bucks out of my pocket and donated it to this campaign. If I don't receive any funding then that money will mostly be eaten up in campaign fee's so I'm putting my faith out there.

Please donate or share  if you are able and thank you so much! God bless!

story:
From the Desk of Marty Ettington-The Founder of the International Longevity Center:

ABOUT THE INTERNATIONAL LONGEVITY CENTER

The International Longevity Center in Los Angeles has been established as a unique blend of alternative health and scientific approaches to holistic health and was founded by the Author and Entrepreneur Marty Ettington for people - who are serious about living a longer, healthier life.



Complementary alternative medicine and life extension methods have become increasingly popular among Americans over the past several years as an important factor for individual patient care and for the health care system as a whole.

The good news is that health breakthroughs in longevity are accelerating. The bad news is that all available information is highly biochemistry or nutrition centric driven by the revenue oriented health industry. But our longevity research shows exactly, that our body, mind and soul needs more mindfulness to build up Personal Longevity, listen up people…biochemistry and choosing the right nutrition alone does not do the job of building up personal longevity !

PLUS there are tons of great literature and individual courses out there focusing on new age topics like yoga, holistic mindset building or natural food awareness - But the problem is there is no one training program combining holistic and medical health training all in one place with the goal to completely cover…all for Personal Longevity  building principles !

Courses and Seminars about how to leverage and build up Personal Longevity either do not exist or are still very hard to find. Improvement seminars in order to build better longevity in our entire body, mind and soul system as immediate usable, actionable learning programs and personal implementation plans, but -

This is EXACTLY what our Longevity Center is concentrating on.



“Not only are our workshops one of the first worldwide programs with clear step by step instructions on “How to build Long Term Health and Personal Longevity”, but they are also one of the best sources around for learning how you really can prolong your life 10, 20 or more years” --Marty Ettington, Founder of the International Longevity Center Los Angeles




 
All biotechnics aside, we should not overlook the huge opportunity that already exist for consciousness-expanding and life enriching experiences by tapping into our inner body, mind and soul resources, in order to leverage our full human potential for building up our Personal Longevity.

Our small team of scientists, engineers, self-experimenters, and early adopters are continuously researching within the fields of long term health, longevity, medicine, and many other related fields to generate expert advice, expert research, and expert guidance within our Longevity workshops.

PLEASE MAKE SURE TO CHECK OUT THE VIDEO OF LONG LIVED PERSONS FROM 120-250 YEARS OLD BELOW


On a continuous basis we are applying this knowledge to develop long term health and personal longevity learning programs for individuals and educational employee health programs for organizations, including providing information for the aspect of government planning and optimization perspectives like nursing home planning.

But we would need your support to take it up a notch now, in order to bring our scientific based information about “How to build Personal Longevity” within workshops & seminars to the world !  



Chronic Disease Prevention & Treatment

How about instead of having to deal with chronic illness, to have perfect long term health, incredible relationships, a career you love, a life filled with happiness and enough life time to fulfill your bucket list ?

The center sees itself as a important “Think Tank” and learning supplement for knowledge on optimal health and longevity within our society.

During the Long Term Health and Personal Longevity workshops and seminars, matters like Chronic Illness, and many other health concerns are addressed in a breakthrough way, that bridges the gap between cutting edge science and holistic /alternative medicine, aiming to help people in unique holistic ways to cure their chronic illness patterns, resulting in improvements from being weak, having more energy, bringing individuals from feeling old and frankly or just getting ready to die to developing new long term health and longevity patterns !


We think this is important in our society.




Results of 10 Years of Research

More and more we are finding out there are many things we can do to not only avoid illness, but to actually reverse it! Your body is designed to heal itself naturally and then keep you healthy—IF you know how to do it.

With each biological discovery, the human species climbs one step further toward gaining complete control over its own life processes. 50 years ago the average lifespan was 50 years, now it is more than 75 years. For every year we live more, we have the chance to enjoy our being on this planet more, especially as we are responsible custodians of its environment.

Based on our research we believe our potential to live long lives may be unlimited from both historical records and from current scientific research. The following video is about 14 mins long and shows persons from 120-250 years old.


While it took 10,000 years for humans to figure out the structure of DNA, it only required a little over 50 years to map out the entire human genome! Genes are the cell’s “operating system,” enabling young healthy cells to function flawlessly. Gene expression is unfavorably altered as we age, which is what ultimately causes us to degenerate and eventually die.


If one looks at the rapid technology advances we enjoy today, the probability of conquering aging can be easily analogized. Just think of the progress that has been made in other fields:

• From counting on fingers to supercomputers.
• Riding on horse and buggies to flying on jet planes.
• Waiting for the pony express to instant email.
• Stage plays to satellite TV.




In our Longevity Center we strive to achieve further funding which enables us to finance ongoing scientifically based longevity projects while laying the groundwork for our center location in the not-too-distant future.




Unique Workshops on “How To Build Personal Longevity”


At the personal development learning center we offer workshops and seminars teaching individuals and health professionals the Personal Longevity Program (PLP) - a comprehensive series of 10 courses which teach students from 18 to 80+ about how to achieve long term health and personal longevity from different aspects of Spiritual and Scientific knowledge.

The PLP-Program represents one of the world's first complete personal longevity development course programs, summarizing the latest methods to achieve long term health in combination to providing a precise guide to introduce and advance every health seeker’s knowledge in the methods of how to achieve personal longevity.

The course program provides a unique and science based perspective on how to build long term health and longevity, including all course elements in one integrated workshop:


Student Benefits

• Specific learning processes build the students long term health and personal longevity awareness and capability to extend the personal lifespan like never before

• In the workshops we provide a unique way of helping the trainee/student with step by step teaching, along with demonstrating and explaining the 10 principles of longevity, so the trainee/student will understand these complicated matters by the end of the training as never before and reach an in depth level of understanding.

• A step by step method to assess total physical health which is unique worldwide.

• We help trainees to communicate with their inner world like never before, based on one of the first worldwide training resources to solve and resolve beliefs about long term health and life extension such as: 

• To make changes in current lifestyles

• To manage right nutrition levels

• To develop a deep understanding of unconditional love behavior

• Harmonizing their own energy system to leverage and maximize long term health

• Life extension longevity abilities by facilitating adequate training around these
      topics.

• Provide worldwide unique Long term health and personal longevity Metrics.



The Courses are available in different life workshop/seminars or as online training:




Our Longevity Blog

Our founder of the Center has established one of the worlds most frequented BLOGs on Long Term Health and Longevity. (Click on the image below to check it out)




Our Mission

Our center’s mission is to bring the science of Personal Longevity Development to the world, so that each person has the opportunity to “maximize their lifespan” by making better physical and non-physical life choices, in order to be able to achieve long term health and the highest longevity possible in their life.

Our objective is to teach people from 18 to 80 to help to stay healthier, look better, feel younger and live the longest life possible. It includes workshops and seminars about the history of the search for longevity methods, to provide case histories are given of long lived persons over the age of 150 years old, stories of many other persons who may have lived thousands of years, long lived plants and animals, what science says about the search for longevity, a theory about how your physical health relates to your spiritual health, practices to grow spiritually and increase your vital forces, practices to improve your health and longevity, supplements to improve your body's health and longevity, how to avoid accidents and many more.



Step by step Learning Features and Benefits

Our Course program is right for people, who are open minded about spirituality and alternative therapies to improve their lives and who have a desire to find their life purpose and focus their lives more on what their true paths should be. The Program offers unique beneficial aspects. Our seminars and workshops around the topic personal life longevity provide a unique step by step guidance and personal longevity training, as it equips every student with a scientifically researched but easy to comprehend learning framework, to understand the necessary 10 health principles of building personal life longevity.

See a small sample of our Non-Physical Profile spreadsheet below:


HEALTH PROFESSIONAL PROGRAM

In addition to our workshops for individuals seeking to control aging better, our objective is to develop and provide health professionals with methods to teach their new and existing patients, students and clients how they can enable themselves to live in vigor, health and wellness for the longest period of time possible.


Our advanced Certificate Program provides Health Care Professionals with a foundational knowledge in Personal Longevity, as integrated approach to care, addressing the whole person: mind, body, and spirit, using a unique step by step approach with a focus on meeting the patient/client where they are.

Participants gain a broad understanding of how to utilize lifestyle approaches to improve health and wellbeing (including: nutrition, mindfulness long term health and longevity planning and physical activity), techniques to both motivate change and reduce stress, along with a solid knowledge of ongoing self-care assignments to establish a longevity training baseline and energy work.


Educational Goals 


  • Health Professionals learn to acquire motivational interviewing skills to support successful lifestyle and behavior change in clients/patients.
  • Learn how to measure non-physical and physical health analytically and use our processes in order to get regular feedback to improve health and longevity profile over time
  • Learn about a merging of alternative/holistic and traditional medical health knowledge so the student can enjoy the best of both health perspectives in his life.
  • Learn a unique spiritual transformation process related to long term health based on longevity meditational and transformational learning exercises, so the student can relieve stress, be more centered and bring the spiritual blueprint of perfect health down into your body.
  • Learn our unique research on very long lived persons so you know what is really possible for a healthy long life, since others have done it before.
  • Become part of a community of people learning about and getting involved together in the best total health practice Discuss whole health/lifestyle factors including: environmental factors, nutrition choices, levels of and ability to be resilient to stress, dietary supplement usage, physical activity, and personal relationships.
  • Gain a broad understanding of the range of beneficial health approaches available to patients, including lifestyle, mind-body, and complementary and alternative therapies. Develop strong patient interviewing skills to support a whole-person approach.
  • Work effectively with and clearly communicate with integrative medicine clinicians regarding client/patients health.
  • Develop self-care techniques, goal setting and attaining strategies to improve one's own health and wellbeing.


Curriculum

Course work will include the following topics:

Stress & Long Term Health; Longevity Self-Care; Motivational Interviewing; Healing Relationships Mind-Body; Spirituality, Mindfulness, Mental Health Lifestyle Approaches: Nutrition, Longevity Movement, Micronutrients and Common Dietary Supplements Complementary & Alternative Approaches: Long Term Health and Longevity Therapies, Energy Therapies, Traditional Chinese Medicine, Chakra, Ayurveda, and Homeopathy


Our Vision

Every choice we make in dealing with complicated societal boundaries like continued financial world issues, climate and environmental change, political corruption, energy, or food and water crises, affect all of us, and it seems to me like we are almost the first generation that can really influence the choice whether or not our humanity is going to survive well or not.

We believe, that with the right set of long term health and longevity planning, within a powerful combination of psychological, spiritual, vital forces, and physical principles, many chronic conditions, aging fears, and other societal future concerns can be addressed in a positive way and cured by changing to a more conscious lifestyle, which is the key for change.

In doing so, we empower ourselves to have unlimited support for the creation of all that is life afﬁrming, life enhancing, and life expanding - we believe that we all can change the world by reorganizing our lives to align ourselves with the intention to consciously positively evolve and begin co-creating a world of a more positive personal freedom for us all !


Planned Move To New Location (Use of funds) 

Please support this scientifically grounded and positive movement.

We did a reality check of our business fundamental needs and here it is below…

We have already everything lined up, a great concept and a great team…, we just need YOU to make it happen, so we can actually start the move in our center.

With funds raised, we can purchase equipment, pay business permit fees, make a lease down payment for the first half year, establish workshop readiness in the new building and pay for all costs which are involved for the new location start up.

We will have expenses for professional services (lawyer, accountant, consultant, space designer, etc.), permits and inspections, beginning inventory, marketing, pre-opening labor, etc. We also want to set aside operating capital to pay bills, our employees, and ourselves a bit, until the International Center becomes profitable.

Expenses anticipated include personnel, marketing, sales, legal work on contract agreements with our provider network, accounting, and admin expenses.


WISHLIST Building Number One:

We spotted an absolute charming and great enough office building to lease space for our new Center location. It is on 18411 Crenshaw, Torrance, CA 90504 within the Los Angeles Metro Area. See a picture of it below…


We have checked several buildings and other center project plans and we are confident that we have now a realistic range of costs even beyond the expenses for equipment, fixtures, furnishings, and contractor labor. 


To estimate possible future business performance of the first international center is not an easy task, as there is much to compare with for now. But we project a high number of average workshop signups, and the number of expected students that will visit our courses each day, as we hope will show growth month by month. Other new age related chains have already proven that they are able to grow month by month with their programs.

We have determined within our monthly financial projections possible loss or profit that can be expected from the business and we are planning to set aside a capital reserve to cover any projected monthly losses, so that your business can keep operating as we strive for profitability.

We have checked several project plans and we are confident that we now have a realistic range of costs even beyond the expenses for equipment, furnishings, programs and workshops and contractor labor. 

What we have already achieved:

• We have formed a management team

• We have developed our longevity training curriculum

• We have developed the design for the new center 


Why we need your support

Now, we are here on INDIGOGO because our current location has limited space availability and as we are growing we also really could need your help to secure a bigger location for the Longevity Center, so we can run more long term health research and personal longevity seminars and workshops in a bigger way for you.

By supporting the first of its kind Longevity Center in America, you would help to accomplish… 

• That everyone get’s a chance to leverage and develop their own long term health and personal longevity to its maximum,

• To create a real chance to help improve consciousness about long term health lifestyle in our society and lower our high healthcare tax burden.

My team and I want to invite you to support our efforts – it really needs YOU to accomplish that consciousness-expanding and life enriching experiences change in our society.

All that is only possible, if my team and I would be able to establish and open the new International Longevity Center and build it up as a great location.

Thank you for your time and attention.

 

Founder and CEO of The International Longevity Center

A Personal video message from the founder of the Longevity Center:

           


PERKS/ REWARDS


We think we have developed great rewards for you, but we believe that participating at these campaign to support more personal freedom on our planet is something, which relates to all of us anyway, as we all want to life greatly and as long as possible.

Please consider supporting with your own useful new year’s resolution…

Donating to us could be the best investment you make in your own health and wellness! See below…

To say thank you for your attention to our project please choose from the following rewards, we hope to match your “personal taste”.

$5 REWARD

For your $5 support we will send you for free right away after your contribution with email…

• Our complete 10 Lessons Personal Longevity Program E-Course on How to build up Long Term Health and Personal Longevity,
• A valuable E-book on happiness and enlightenment (Amazon retail value $10),
• Choose one of the videos listed below when we send you a followup email and we will send it to you:
               1) Cellular Regeneration
               2) Visualizing the Future
• Of course your Name will shine on our new Center Donor Board.
• Plus you automatically qualify for our drawing for a free LONGEVITY T-SHIRT
(Retail value $16.90).

The LONGEVITY T-SHIRT has several THEMES, see below, just let us know your favorite…(You can choose the color)
 


$25 REWARD

· All rewards from the $5 rewards,

· Plus receive the 10 PRINCIPLES OF PERSONAL LONGEVITY BOOK for FREE (Amazon Retail Value $39.90!) as downloadable e-book. You can download the book immediately after your donation. Thank you !

Learn how to master and control your own health. This book is the result of five years of research on longevity. It consists of the 10 principles of a Holistic Philosophy which will improve your long term health, have improved happiness, and extend your longevity. You can start immediately to…

* Apply methods to look and feel younger and slow your aging exercises
* Learn long term health practices to live to 150 years and beyond
* Live to accomplish all of your goals in life
* Continue to be very active when you are much older See more information on the book at: http://mkettingtonbooks.com/10principles.html

  • We will send you right away after your contribution a free Long Term Health and Longevity Capability Status Assessment ! With this easy to use extended baseline survey spreadsheet you will be able to determine your current physical and non-physical health status, which will help you to implement the 10 principles on Personal Longevity. All in one easy download file.
AN EXCLUSIVE REWARD FOR CAMPAIGN CONTRIBUTORS ONLY

LIMITED EDITION

This groundbreaking Ebook by Martin Ettington on Personal Freedom will be released to the general public within the first quarter of 2014.The Chapters in this new Ebook include:

* Do we need more Freedom?
* Our Reality Boxes
* What is Personal Freedom?
* Why should we want to Change?
* Personal Freedom Patterns
* Some Ways to Initiate Change
* Changing Ourselves on the Inside

Plus for your contribution you qualify to enter into the drawing for a complete free Personal Longevity DVD Home Study Course (Retail value $450!)

We will send you BY email a Report on Longevity Coaching as Career

$50 REWARD

Once the profile is established, then Marty will work with you on your unique and specific personal questions or issues you have, which will then lead to specific recommendations and exercises for you regarding your life purpose and will provide you with specific positive mind exercises to break out of the “programmed shells” we normally live inside of.

The coaching appointment with Marty Ettington can be either online as Skype meeting or as in-person meeting within a Los Angeles Metro Area venue only. You can schedule a convenient time with Marty by phone.

$1000 REWARD

  • All rewards from the $499 rewards list plus
  • You get our complete Personal Longevity DVD Home Study Program
This convenient home study Longevity program (Retail Value $469!) is your ticket to long term health and Personal Freedom. The entire DVD Home Study Program contains all exercises on…

-How to develop a new healthy lifestyle to live healthier and longer -How to implement the 10 principles into your life
-How to measure results to show improvements in your overall health over time -The latest scientific research in therapies which help improve your own health and longevity
-24/7/365 email support service to you from our Longevity Team  

Within the Personal Longevity DVD Home Study Program you can earn a new approach to total long term health and longevity which combines the best of holistic practices and medical science on longevity !
  • Plus to support your Home Study efforts, you get an additional two more hours of longevity coaching from the founder Marty Ettington.


    $5000 REWARD

    · All rewards from the $1000 rewards plus
    · you will get 20 additional hours of personal longevity consulting plus

    · All 28 of Martin Ettington's Spiritual and Longevity related Ebook This Reward represents an altogether Retail and Concierge Health Service value of over $8000 !

    What this new Long Term Health Concierge service is all about: Normally students of Longevity within our International Longevity Center can become subscribers to a monthly Subscription Health Service, normally for a one year period within different levels like Platinum, Gold, Silver, and Bronze Levels.

    Additional support and new profile reviews are done periodically to measure client changes to help them get on and stay on a path for optimum total health. In person and online support to answer your questions and to provide continual new materials and updates are complimentary services. What you get:

    For your generous $5000 support, you will get the highest possible Concierge Health Service possible, which is the PLATINUM SERVICE LEVEL, to develop your long term health and longevity with one of the best services currently available on the longevity market; here is what you get…

Become a vital part of the scientific based longevity movement our center represents and join our Team.
